And because of that, child, know that in the operation which is in this chapter mentioned as sucking out the pus, which is also called aspiration, incision of the abscess or extraction of the bone or incision of the stone and its like.
E de totz aquels so acompanhatz temor e tremor e en le mas de lor catz la mort.	And all those are accompanied by fear and trembling, and in the midst of them death.
E yeu amonesti vos que sobre vos no caia aquo en le qual es esitacio, quar alcunas veguadas cazo deves vos manieyras de homes am manieyras motas de malautias.	And I warn you that you should not fall into that in which there is doubt, because some evils are caused by human errors.
E de lor es alcu que s’irays am la sua malautia e es leugiera deves lu la mort, e aysso per la vehemensia de aquo que troba de sa malautia, e per longuesa de la malautia de lu, e am la malautia es paor la qual significa mort.	And from them there is some that you will go to your own illness and it will be caused by death, and you will suffer from the violence of your illness, and from the length of your illness, and from the fear of the illness which means death.
E de aquels es le qual dona a tu son aver e ditta, tu esperant am aquel sanetat, e la sieua malautia es perniciosa.	And of those who give you that which you have and say it is a remedy, you should wait for the health, and their sickness is harmful.
E donc no cove que tu consentas en aquel que ve a vos del qual es aquesta manieyra; e la vostra cautela sia major que covesitat e la vostra rapacitat; e no presumatz alcuna causa sobre aquo sino aprop sciencia certa la qual virifica aquo deves vos, e al qual perve successio lausabla.	And therefore do not trust that which comes to you from the one who does it in this way; and your caution should be greater than what is customary, and your greed; and do not presume any cause about it unless you first obtain certain knowledge by which it verifies for you, and to which successful succession praises.
E usatz en la curacio de totz vostres malautes de pronosticacio e indicacio de lu al qual es salut convertida, quar en aquel es a vos ajutori sobre adquisicio de fama e de memoria, de lausor e de gloria.	And use in the treatment of all your sicknesses diagnosis and indication of that to which it is converted as salvation, because in that one there is for you help above acquisition of fame and memory, of praise and glory.
O, filhs, Dieus en vos spire le sieu entendement e no oste a vos direccio e proteccio, quar aquo es en la sua ma.	O, children, God gives you His own understanding and does not lead you in the wrong direction and protect you, because that is in His hand.
E yeu e ordenat aquest capitol distingent per capitols segon que precedit en le capitol de cauteris, de la cura del cap entro als pes, per que sia a vos alleujat aquo que demandatz de aquo e del qual havetz necessitat.	And you should distinguish this chapter by chapters following the second chapter of cauteries, of the cure of the head between the feet, so that it is good for you to ask about that and of which you have need.
Capitol primier.	Chapter One.
De la curacio de aygua la qual es contenguda en le cap dels enfantz.	About the cure of gout that is contained in the head of children.
Sapias que aquesta malautia motas veguadas endeve als enfantz deves le enfantament e quan la noyrissa estrenh le cap del enfant ses livitat.	You should know that this disease often affects children during childhood, especially when the newborn's head is soft.
E alcunas veguadas endeve per causa amaguada la qual no es saubuda.	Sometimes it occurs due to an unknown cause.
Mays yeu no vi aquesta malautia sino en les enfantz; e a totz aquels les quals yeu vi se coytec la mort, e per ayssi es a mi vist layssada obra en aquels.	I have never seen this disease in adults; and to all those whom I have seen who had it, death was always the result, and for this reason it has been seen as an unfortunate work in those cases.
E yeu e vist que un enfant le cap del qual era d’aygua omplit, e·l cap de lu era totjorn ayssi magnificat entro que ceser no podia sobre si meteys per la grandesa del sieu cap, e mays que la humiditat fe aucmentada entro que foc mort.	I have seen a child whose head was full of water, and the child's head was always magnificently swollen until it could not be touched because of its size, and more than the water increased inside until it died from fire.
E aquesta humiditat o es agreguada entre la codena e l’os, o es agreguada dejos le os sobre le ciphac.	And this water is added between the bone and the cartilage, or it is added behind the bone over the joint.
Quar la operacio en aquel si la humiditat es entre la codena e l’os e le apostema es pauc, lahoras cove que tu fendas en le mieg loc del cap am una fissura en la latitut, e sia la longitut de la fissura cays dos notz entro que corra la humiditat, e aquesta es la forma del spatum:	If the water is between the bone and the cartilage and the abscess is small, then you should make an incision in the middle of the child's head at the level of the latitud, and the length of the incision should be two fingers deep until the water runs out, and this is the shape of the spatula:
E donc si la humiditat es mays augmentada e l’apostema es major, lahoras son aqui dos fissuras segon aquesta manieyra:	And if the humidity increases even more and the abscess becomes larger, then here are two incisions according to this method:
E si la humiditat es dejos le os, senhal de lu es que tu vezes la comissuras del cap ubertas de tota partida e l’aygua es spremuda quan tu compremes aquela am la tieua ma a las partidas dedintz e no es aquo a tu amaguat.	And if the humidity reaches the bone, then you should expose all the corners of the head and pour water into it when you understand that the wound is clean and not to your hand.
Cove que tu fendas en le mieg loc del cap am tres fissuras segon aquesta manieyra:	So that you make three incisions at the middle of the head according to this method:
e aprop la inscizio extratz ne tota la humiditat; e aprop strenh las fissuras am draps e plumassols; e aprop enbroca aquo de sobre am vi e oli entro al quint dia, e aprop deslia le liament e cura la plagua am tentas e enguentz, e strenh le cap am equalitat; e mange le malaute am vianda secca de pauca humiditat entro que·l membre sia confortat e sanat.	And then remove all the humidity through the incision; and strengthen the incisions with cloths and feathers; and apply hot water from above and olive oil for five days, and remove the scab and cure the wound with trials and remedies, and strengthen the head with equality; and feed the patient with dry food of little humidity until that member is comfortable and healed.
E es autra manieyra de incisio, que consideras hon apar la magnitut del apostema e la colleccio de l’aygua, quar alcunas veguadas es mays en le occipicii, o en la partida denant, o en la destra, o en la sinistra; e donc aten am la incizio on appar le apostema e la replecio de l’aygua, e fen aquo segon que a tu es miels possible.	And there is another method of incision, which you should consider according to the size of the abscess and the collection of water, as sometimes it appears in the back, or in the part downwards, or on the right, or on the left; and then pay attention to the incision where the abscess and the collection of water appear, and do that which is most possible for you.
Et observa que no inscindas la arteria e endevengua flueys de sanc e mora le malaute per aquel flux de sanc am evacuacio de humiditat.	And observe that you do not cut the artery and engage it with a bandage, as this may cause the patient to die from blood loss due to the outflow of blood during the evacuation of humidity.
Capitol .ii.	Chapter II.
De inscisio de las arterias las quals so aprop las aurelhas, apeladas hilasseysse.	About the incision of the arteries that are close to the ears, called temple arteries.
Capitol segon.	Chapter Two.
Quan endeveno ad alcu catars o raumas als huelhs o al pietz, e es antiquat aquo, e no confereys en aquo la curacio de las medicinas, lahoras la deriera curacio en aquest es incizio de aquelas dos arterias.	When a catarrh or swelling occurs in the throat or chest, and this is treated, and no cure is found in this treatment, then the cure should be sought in the incision of those two arteries.
E donc cove quan tu vols inscidir aquelas que le malaute raza lo sieu cap, e aprop fregua le loc am drap aspre per so que aparan las arcerias, e aprop sia strengut le col del malaute am alcu drap; e aprop considera on polsa la vena; e les locs de quascuna sobre les locs les quals so aprop las aurelhas depremutz, e tant se occultan sino en alcus homes.	And therefore, when you want to incise those arteries that the patient holds in his hand, and you apply a rough cloth to the place so that the vessels appear, and you strengthen the neck of the patient with some cloth; and consider where the vein is; and the places of each one are close to the places that are close to the ears, which are hidden in some people.
E aprop senha sobre la arceria am tenta, e aprop inscideys quascuna am le spatum de quascuna partida agut am inscizio pervenient entro al os, e sia aquo per la latitut del cap.	And then approach the arch with a probe, and then insert each one into the space of each part that is sharp and enters into the bone, and that is also for the width of the head.
E si vols, entromet le spatum dejos la arteria e trenqua aquala a las inciden a las partidas desus.	And if you want, insert the probe through the artery and cut that into the parts above.
E sia la longitut de la inscizio cays dos ditz ajustatz, quar quan alcuna vena es inscizida le sanc es eyssit am egressio pulsatil, le qual saut deforo per saut frequent.	And if the length of the incision is not adjusted to those two adjustments, when any vein is incised, the blood flows out in a pulsatile manner, which is often missed.
Mays si la arceria no apareys al cintiment, lahoras cove que tu mesures de la aurelha la quantitat del spazi de tres ditz, e aprop senha am tenta, e fen entro al os.	But if the arch does not appear at the circumference, then measure the amount of space from three adjustments, and then approach the probe, and enter into the bone.
E aquo que cove getar del sanc es quantitat de vi unc., e fort leu ne geta de lu mays o mens, e tot aquo es segon la quantitat la qual appareys de la vertut del malaute e de la replecio de la arceria de lu.	And that which is taken from the blood is an amount of one unit, and very little does not take more or less, and all that is according to the amount that appears from the virtue of the patient and the expansion of the arch of that.
E aprop considera la plagua, e donc si reman sobre le os alcuna causa del ciphac, lahoras inscindys aquo per so que no endevengua apostema caut.	And then consider the cause, and if there is some reason for the phimosis, then incise that so that it does not become an abscess cautiously.
E aprop strenh la plagua am plumassols e am liamentz de drap de li, e aprop cura aquela am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And then strengthen the wound with feathers and strips of cloth, and then care for that area until it is healed.
Capitol .iii.	Chapter III.
De extraccio de las arcerias las quals so en las templas.	About the extraction of stones that are in the temples.
Quan ad alcu accideys emigranea antiqua o catertz agutz, per humiditatz agrimonials e per qualiditat en les lacertz des templas, o sodo antiqua vehement e semblantz ad aquels, e es medicat am las manieyras de curacio de medicina e aquo no comfereys, lahoras nos hem sproatz en aquestas malautias extraccio de las arcerias en les templas, o cauterizacio de aquelas ayssi cum havem mostrat.	When ancient or large stones migrate to the temples due to moisture and quality in the eyebrows, or violent and similar ones, and they are treated with medical methods and do not improve, we have shown in these diseases extraction of stones from the temples, or cauterization of those that we have shown.
E la manieyra de la operacio e extracio de aquelas es que·l malaute raza les pels les quals son en les templas; e entenda a la arceria apparent en le templar quar ela es a tu mostrada per le sieu pols, e·s occultada sino en paucs homes per vehemencia de freg.	And the method of the operation and extraction of those is that the patient removes the hairs that are in the temples; and then he understands the stone that is apparent in the temple where it is shown by its size, and it is hidden only to a few people due to its violent nature.
E si a tu es occultada, lahoras le col del malaute sia strengut am alcun drap; e aprop fregua le loc am un drap aspre o evapora le loc am aygua cauda entro que aparesca a tu la arceria manifestament.	And if it is hidden, then the neck of the patient should be strengthened with some cloth; and then the area should be scraped with a rough cloth or evaporate the area with hot water until the stone appears clearly to you.
E lahoras tu pren le spatum del qual aquesta es la forma:	And here is the shape of the tool you will use:
E aprop tu scorja la codena am aquel am facilitat entro que pervenguas a la arceria; e aprop geta en lu onti e extratz aquela a las partidas sobiranas entro que extraguas aquela de la codena e descobras aquela de las tunicas las quals so dejos aquela, de tota partida.	And then you will use the scissors to cut the thread that is in the way until you reach the archery; and then you will insert them into the wound and extract the threads that are above the surgical area until you remove the thread from the scissors and discover the threads of the tunics that were left there, from every part.
Mays si la arteria es subtil, lahoras envolveys aquela am la extremitat del oncii, e aprop inscindeys de aquela una partida segon la quantitat per la qual sian alonguadas las extremitatz de lu e sian contraytas, e no endevindra flux de sanc, quar si no so inscididas no pujara le sanc de tot.	But if the artery is thin, then wrap it with the end of the needle, and then cut one part according to the amount by which its ends were elongated and stretched, and not too much, because if they are not cut, the blood will not stop flowing.
E aprop evacua del sanc de vi unc. entro a tres.	And then remove about one unit of blood every three minutes.
E si la arceria es gran, lahoras cove que tu lies aquela en dos locs am fiel dopble fort de ceda o am cordas a lonc, e no coyte a lu putrefaccio denant la consolidacio de la plagua e endevengua flux de sanc.	And if the wound is large, then you will sew it in two places with strong double thread of silk or with cord, and not cover it with the putrefaction that prevents the consolidation of the wound and does not stop the blood flow.
E aprop incideys la superfluitat la qual es entre dos liamentz; e fay aquo en aquela hora o aprop autra ora.	And then, approach the excess that is between two ligaments; and do so at that hour or at another time.
E si vols, cauteriza aquela am cauteri entro al os am cauteri cutellar entro que sian incididas las extramitatz de lu, e stara en loc de aquela meteyssa obra.	And if you wish, cauterize that pointed cautery into the joint where the excess has been incised, and it will be in the place of that missing part.
E es milhor obra sino que·l malaute aia febre o es de escalfada compleccio; quar cauteri es de aquelas causas que ajudan a las humiditatz finidoras, e donc es milhor en juvament.	And it is better work if the patient has fever or a scalded condition; because cauterization is one of those causes that help to finish moisture, and therefore it is better in young people.
E cove aprop la extraccio de las arcerias que huomplas le loc de coto antic, e sian pausatz sobre lu polvils decentement fayt, e aprop sia curat am medicinas seccas fazen naysser la carn e am calguas entro que sia sanat.	And cover the extraction of the ribs that have collapsed in the old hollow, and place them on clean dust properly made, and then apply dry medicines to heal the flesh and warmth inside until it is healed.
E si mentre obres autra veguada endeventa flux de sanc de la arceria, lahora tu te coyta a restrenger aquel sanc, o am cauteri, o que omplas le loc de coto, e strenh la tua ma entro que sia restreyt le sanc.	And if while you are working on another part of the ribs, at that time you should restrict that sinew, or cauterize it, or what fills the hollow place, and strengthen your hand until it is restricted.
E si deguna causa de aquelas no es a tu present, lahoras pausa le tieu dit sobre le loc entro que·l sanc sia congilat, e enbroca le loc am aygua de vehement fregiditat entro que la acuitat repausa, e sia strengut segon que cove.	If you do not have any of those present, then pause your finger over the spot where the swelling is connected, and apply cold water from a vehemently cold source until the inflammation subsides, and then strengthen it according to the convenience.
E aquo que es pus leugier en extraccio de arceria es que tu cauterizes la vena am aquest cauteri haventz dos cotels, pus que tu has senhat les dos locs am tenta, e depausa quascus, mot ignitz, entro que pervenguan al os e inscindan la vena en dos locs, per so que sia elonguat aquo que es entre las extremitatz de lu, quar no son consolidadas de tot am aquest cauteri.	And that which is used more in the extraction of tartar is that you cauterize the vein with this cautery having two prongs, because you have to feel both sides well, and pause as needed, moving it until it reaches the bone and cuts the vein into two parts, so that it is elongated between its extremities, which are not solidified at all by this cauterization.
E aquesta es la forma del cauteri:	And this is the form of the cautery:
E sia la acuitat dels dos cotels esemps.	And the sharpness of the two prongs is as follows.
Mays empero si so mendres acuitat que dos cotels es milhor, quar si so agudas cum dos cotels propera a quascuna freg, e no enscideysso la carn am velocitat.	But if the sharpness of two prongs is too great, it is better to have one with a slightly dulled edge, because if they are very sharp, they tend to cut the flesh at high speed.
Donc cum en aquels es alcuna grossitut, es tenguda la calor del foc en aquels e la carn es abscindida leugierament.	When there is an excess in those places, the heat of the fire should be applied to them and the flesh should be removed liberally.
E aquesta obra es milhor en tota obra e pus leugiera.	And this work is better than any other work and more thorough.
E sia le spazi le qual es entre dos cotels la quantitat de la grossesa del dit.	And the space between two ribs is equal to the amount of the mentioned excess.
Capitol quart.	Chapter Four.
De la cura de cors de lagremas agudas e aciduas dels huels.	Of the treatment of bodies with sharp and acidic wounds of the wounds.
Quan so lagremas aciduas, e es le cors de aquelas venas las quals so sobre le test del cap deforo, e no comfereys en aquo alcuna causa de la curacio de medicina, e vezes la cara del malaute ja enrogesir e sent en le sieu front deambulacio ayssi cum si era deambulacio de formiguas, e·ls huels de aquel so extenuatz, humitz enayssi que ja les pels de lor son conodutz, e las parpelas so scalfadas per la acuitat de las lacrimas, les antics agro mesties en la curacio de aquelas de aquesta operacio, e nompnero aquela curacio am spassa.	When the wounds are acidic, and the body is one of those veins that are above the forehead, and there is no cause of healing in medicine, and the face of the patient becomes swollen and feels pain in their forehead as if they were walking with ants, and the wounds of that one are exhausted, humid as if their fur was known, and their feathers are scratched by the acidity of the tears, the ancient remedies in the treatment of those of this operation, and not to call that treatment "spreading".
E es que tu comandas al malaute rayre les pels les quals son en le sieu front, e aprop inscideys en le front tres fissuras engualment distans segon la longitut del front.	And you command the patient to raise their arms, which are on their forehead, and then insert three equal fissures along the length of the forehead.
E si’ la longitut de la fissura cays dos ditz: la una fissura sia engualment distant a la longitut del nas en le mieg loc del front, e la segonda segon la longitut un petit del movement dels lacertz les quals so en le lacrimal, e la tersa del autre part.	And if the length of the fissure is two times: the first fissure should be equally distant from the length of the nose in the middle of the forehead, and the second along the length of a small movement of the eyelids which are on the lacrimal, and the third on the other side.
E guarda te de la incizio de las arcerias las quals so en dos latz, e elongua la tua ma de la continuacio de amdos las mandibulas.	And watch out for the arches that are in two layers, and lengthen your hand from the continuation of the jaws.
E si’ l’espazi de quascuna inscizio la quantitat de tres ditz ajustatz.	And if the space of each insertion is three times the quantity: adjust it.
E si’ a tu una pessa d’espongua apparelhada o draps seccatz motz am les quals exsiccas le sanc.	And if you have a sponge or dry cloth, moisten the parts that are dry.
E aprop entremet le spatum de dos agudas extremitatz, del qual aquesta es la forma de la inscisio de lu:	And then place the space of two sharp extremities, of which this is the form of the insertion:
que es de la partida des templas entro a la segonda inscizio.	which is from the part of the temples into the second insertion.
Exxcorja am aquel tota la codena la qual es entre dos incizios am le ciphac le qual es sobre le os, e aprop fay aquo de la inscizio migera entro a la segonda inscisio.	Excise all the tissue that is between two incisions above the bone, and then move it towards the second incision.
E aprop stratz ne aquest spatum e entromet en la primieyra inscizio autra vetz un autre instrument le qual es apelat cutellar, agut de una part e del autre no agut.	And then step into this space and insert the first instrument, which is called a scalpel, sharp on one side and not sharp on the other.
E pausa le latz de aquel agut deves la carn annexa deves la codena, e le latz de lu leon dintz le os, e empelley aquel entro que pervengua a la fissura migera, e abscindeys am aquel totz les vaysels que descendo del cap als huels.	And place the sharp side of the scalpel against the flesh attached to the tissue, and the dull side on the bone, and push it into that space until it reaches the second incision, and cut all the vessels that descend from the head to the feet.
Mays que sia continuada la inscizio ad aquo appar de la codena, e aprop fay aquo en la fissura migana entro al autra fissura.	May the incision be continued along that edge of the tissue, and then move it into the second incision.
E pus que corr del sanc quantitat engual, exprem les locs de las pessas del sanc congilat.	And when an equal amount has been removed, express the locations of the joints of the bone with a congealed substance.
E aprop pausa en quascuna fissura calgua de coto vielh, e pausa sobre aquels polvils enbegutz en vi e oli e vi agre, e vegas que no endevengua apostema caut.	And then place a piece of old cloth in each incision, and place your hand over those powders that are in a liquid and a dry state, and make sure they do not become infected.
E en le tertz dia deslia le liament e aministra gran enfusio de aygua cauda o tebeza, e aprop cura aquo am enguent bazilicon am oli rozat e autres entro que las plaguas sian sanadas.	And on the third day, remove the bandage and administer a large amount of warm water or tea, and then care for that area with an ointment made from basilicon, olive oil, and other ingredients until the wounds are healed.
Capitol .v.	Chapter V.
De la cura de lagramas per catartz e als huels descendentz de las partidas dedintz del cap.	Of the treatment of gravel and the stones that descend from the parts divided by the head.
Quan ad alcu veno catartz agutz e continuantz, e vezes les huels del malaute extenuatz petitz, e ja le reguardament de lor es debelitat, e las palpebras ulceradas e de lor cazo les pels, e en le preon del cap es dolor aguda ledent e extrenutacio consequent, lahoras sapias per aquestz accidentz que las materias e catartz no veno sino de motas venas de las partidas dedintz procedent.	When a person has frequent gravel and stones that descend from the parts divided by the head, and often the patient's eyes become weakened, and their eyelids ulcerated and the hairs fall out, and in the forehead of the head there is sharp pain and subsequent exhaustion, you should know for these accidents that the materials and gravel do not come from any other veins than those from the parts divided by the head.
E la milhor curacio en aquels es aquesta: que comandes al malaute que raza lo sieu front, e aprop inscideys en aquel una fissura al mieg loc del front, un petit per la latitut (e comensa am la fissura del templar senestre entro al dextre templar; e sia inscisio entro al os; e eslongua la tua ma dels lacertz del templas lesquals son maugutz deves la mastigacio), entro que sia le os descubert.	And the best treatment for these is to order the patient to raise their own forehead, and then insert a small incision at the middle of the forehead, on the left side (and begin the incision from the temple on the left into the right temple; and it should be incised through the bone; and extend your hand through the temple bones which are muddied by mastication), until the bone is exposed.
Exsicca tot le sanc am espongua o am drap secc e aprop repleys entre las doas labias de la fissura am coto vielh o am draps de li.	Dry the entire wound with a dry cloth or dry cloths and then stuff them between the two labia of the old man's crotch or with his clothes.
E aprop estrenh desus am polvils enbegutz en vi e oli per so que no endevengua apostema caut.	And then apply a new dressing on the swollen part to prevent it from becoming an abscess.
E quan deslias aquo e veses que l’apostema ja es diminuit, lahoras cove que fregua le os entro que comensa en lu nayser carn, e aprop cura aquel am regiment exsiccatiu le qual fassa neysser la carn, ayssi cum si tu prenes de farina de froment dos partidas e de colofania quatre partidas e mescla o, e de lor sia fayt emplastre e sia aministrat en aquestas plaguas a de la carn nativitat.	And when you see that the abscess has decreased, then cover the bone that begins in the nasal cavity with the drying regimen that makes the flesh, as if you take two parts of wheat flour and four parts of colloidal flour and mix them, and from this make a plaster and administer it to these wounds to promote the healing of the flesh.
Capitol .vi.	Chapter VI.
De la cura de aquo que catz en las aurelhas.	Of the treatment of that which catches in the ears.
Tota causa que catz en las aurelhas es una de quatre specias, quar o es peyra mineral o causa semblant a peyra, ayssi cum ferr e veyre, o es de planta ayssi cum ceze o fava, o es causa fluxtibla ayssi cum aygua e vi agre e a lor semblantz, o alcuna bestia.	The cause of that which catches in the ears is one of four kinds, either it is a mineral stone or a cause similar to stone, such as iron and salt, or it is a plant cause such as celery or beans, or it is a fluid cause such as water and vinegar and similar things, or some animal.
E donc quan peyra catz en l’aurelha o autra causa semblant de aquelas causas que no ajustan ne creysso en l’aurelha, e pausa la aurelha al solelh, e si vezes la peyra, lahoras distilla en aquela alcuna causa de oli violat o sizami, e aprop aministra la extraccio de lu, e fay le stornudar am condizi, e oppila las nars deve le aveniment de stornutacio.	When a painful bone spur or other similar cause occurs in the ear or elsewhere, and the ear is not adjusted or believed to be affected, and the ear is placed on the sunlight, and if you see the pain, then some cause of olive oil or sage is distilled into it, and administer the extraction of it, and make the person sneeze as a condition, and open the nostrils for the event of sneezing.
E aprop pausa en le circuit de la aurelha alscunas pessas de drap o lana, e dextendas la aurelha a las partidas desus, quar motas veguadas es foro-getada am aquestas causas.	And then place some pieces of cloth or wool around the ear, and extend the ear to the parts above, which are often forgotten in these causes.
E si no n’es getada, lahoras aministra extraccio de lu am le instrument apelat gesti epicicarios subtil del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if it is not forgotten, then administer the extraction of it with the instrument called the epicircular subtle gesture, which has this form:
E si es foro-getada am gesti, bo es; e sino, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am onci subtil de pauca duplicacio.	And if it is forgotten with the gesture, then good; and if not, then administer the extraction of it with the subtle onchion, which has this form:
E donc si no es foro-getada per aquo, lahoras fay una canula de aram e entromet la extremitat de la canula en le trauc de la aurelha e claus a l’enviro de la canula am cera e am oli mollificada per so que no sia ubert sino la canula.	And if it is not forgotten by that, then make a small aram needle and introduce the end of the needle into the ear canal and close the area around the needle with wax and softened oil so that it is not pushed out but the needle.
E aprop extratz am le tieu vent am fort atraccio, quar tropas veguadas cum aquo que havem recontat.	And then remove the strong-smelling cloth that has been placed on the patient's nose, as we have found it to be harmful.
Mays si no es foro-getada en aquesta manieyra, lahoras pren de halka alumbat o de vecz aparelhat am le qual son preses les ausels una patita quantitat, e pausa aquel en la extremitat de ray, e aprop envolopa sobre aquel coto decentment pausat.	However, if this method is not forgotten, then take some lavender or old clothing that has been used to cover the patient's face, and place it on the end of the bed, and then cover the patient with it decently.
E aprop entromet aquel en le trauc de la aurelha am facilitat, e aprop excicca la aurelha de la humiditat.	And then insert something into the patient's mouth to facilitate breathing, and then dry the mouth from moisture.
E donc si no es foro-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recontadas, lahoras tu coyta a talhar aquela denant que endevengua apostema caut o espasme.	And if all the causes that we have found are not forgotten, then you should cut away the part that has become abscess or spasm.
E la manieyra de talhar aquela es que tu al comensament sancnes le malaute de la vena sephasica e extratz del sanc segon la mannieyra de la vertut de lu, e aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas e converteys l’aurelha a las partidas desus, e fen am petita fissura en la razit de la aurelha deves lo greys de lu en le loc be premegut de lu.	And the way to cut away that part is to first secure the patient's sephasic vein and then remove it according to the method of its virtue, and then place that wound between your hands and turn the patient's mouth to the parts above, and make a small incision in the roof of the mouth where the grey matter of the brain is located.
E sia la fissura de figura lunar entro que pervengua a la peyra, e, la peyra atrobada, osta aquela si podes am instrumentz apropriatz; e aprop cos la fissura en aquela hora am velocitat, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	And if the lunar-shaped wound reaches the bone, and the bone is found, use appropriate instruments; then quickly close the wound at that time, and cure it before it becomes healed.
E si la causa cazent en la aurelha es un dels gras que creysso e so inflatz, lahoras aministra la curacio e la extraccio de lu; mays si no obezeys a tu ad eyssiment, lahoras tu pren spatum teune subtil segon aquesta forma:	And if the cause is in the elbow and it is one of the large glands that believe and swell, then administer the cure and extraction of it; but if you do not follow my advice, then take a thin spatula of this form:
e aministra am aquel la abscizio de aquel gra lo qual es cazut en l’aurelha.	and apply that abscission to the gland that fell into the elbow.
E no fassas aquo quan cogitas que aquel ja es humectat per la vapor del aurelha, e pausa aquel en motas pessas, e prop extratz ne aquelas am les oncis o am gesti subtil, o ab inscizio ayssi co dit havem, quar es alleujada la extraccio de lu.	And do not do that when you think that the gland is already moistened by the vapor of the elbow, and pause it in small presses, and extract it with these tools or with a thin instrument, or ab initio have, which is praised for the extraction of it.
Mays en l’aygua la qual es intrada en l’aurelha cove que·l malaute use de sternutacio am condizi al comensament, e omple la sieua aurelha am alcu coto vielh, e jagua sobre aquela aurelha en la qual es l’aygua, e si per aquo es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, lahoras pren tropas peyras teunas e leons segon la longitut del dit, e calfa aquelas en le foc un pauc, e le pacient entrometa una de aquelas en le trauc de la sua aurelha e saute sobre la un pe sieu de aquela partida e percussia am una autra peyra sobre la peyra la qual es dintz la aurelha.	But in the water that enters the elbow, let the patient use a snuff to condition the start, and fill the elbow with a little old cloth, and apply it over the elbow where the water is, and if it is removed by that, it is good; and if not, then take many thin bones and lions according to the length of the said, and calf them in the fire for a short time, and let the patient insert one of those in the tract of his elbow and strike it with another bone on the bone inside the elbow.
Donc no cesse aquo am peyra entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada.	Then do not stop that stone until all the water is drained out.
E ja l’aygua sira foro-getada enayssi que tu prenguas de papier o de gonc i, e met la una extremetat de lu en l’aurelha e estendas l’autre extremitat am foc entro que sia comburit le may de lu.	And once the water is drained, you take a piece of paper or cotton, and place one end in the ear canal and extend the other end into the fire until it is burned completely.
E prop met i autre gonc e fay aquo tantas veguadas entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada, e stratz aquel am canula ayssi co desus es dit de la peyra extrasadora.	And then put another cotton and do that many times until all the water is drained out, and then remove that with a canula as it is called from below.
Mays en la extraccio de bestia intrant en aquela aurelha, si es a petit cos, ayssi piussa e a lu semblant, cura aquel ayssi cum havem dit en la divisio; mays si es de gran cos la qual causa apar al sen del vezement, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am gesti e oncis, e la causa de lu es pus leugiera de totas las autras causas que cazo en l’aurelha.	In the extraction of beasts entering into that ear canal, if it is a small one, as it is said in the division; but if it is a large one, which causes pain to the side of the womb, then administer the extraction of it with gestures and oncis, and the cause of it is more likely than all other causes that occur in the ear canal.
Mays en la extraccio de verm engendrat en la aurelha, quan tu curas aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e en le tractat de distillacios e no comfereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que tu reguardes la aurelha al solelh.	In the extraction of worms that are generated in the ear canal, when you treat that with what we have said in the division and in the treatise on distillations and do not compare your treatment, then cover that you regulate the ear canal to the sunlight.
E donc si apar aqui alcuna causa dels verms, lahoras extratz aquel am gesti o am onci subtils, mays si no apar deguna causa, lahoras pren una canula dejos streyta e desus ampla de la qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if there appears here any cause of worms, then extract that thin or sharp instrument, but if no cause appears, then take a narrow and wide needle of the following form:
E entromet la extremitat subtil en la aurelha segon la quantitat la qual suffertar puesca le malaute; e aprop sucgeys am aquela per succio fort, e fay aquo motas veguadas, entro que totz les verms sian foro-gitatz.	And insert the thin end of the needle into the second ear, according to the amount that can be tolerated by the patient; then apply strong pressure with that, and make those movements until all the worms are expelled.
Mays si no obezeysso a tu al ayssiment, lahoras tu opila e claus en le circuit de la canula am cera ayssi cum havem dit; lahoras aministre distillacios las quals han ja esproadas les antics en la curacio dels verms, e atrobaras aquo en le tractat de distillacios.	But if they do not obey your instructions, then open and close the circuit of the needle with the following wax; then administer distillations that have been used in the past for treating worms, and find that in the treatise on distillations.
E sia la tua efusio am la qual efundas les olis medicinas en la aurelha am aquest strument del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And your emission is the one that pours the medicinal oils into the second ear using this instrument of which the following is its form:
E fay aquela de argent o de eram, dejos streyt, en le qual sia un petit trauc, e am pla desus.	And make it of silver or brass, narrow, in which there is a small hole, and place it above.
E donc sia cum empellent a que es en la conquavitat de la canula de continent aqui on sira necessari.	And thus, it should be done as it is in the cavity of the catheter for containment here where it is necessary.
E si vols, pren le ray e envolveys en la extremitat de lu decentment coto, e aprop gieta oli en la concavitat del auziment, o suc de alcuna herba, o aquo que vols de aquestas medicinas en la canula — e aquela es en la aurelha —, e aprop entromet le ray am coto desus e exprem am la tua ma aquel am compressio temprada de lu entro que l’oli sia expellit en la concavitat del auziment e le malaute senta le oli dedintz.	And if you wish, take the ray and wrap it in the end of the catheter decently, and then pour oil into the cavity of the auzenment, or some herb, or whatever liquid you want from these medicines in the catheter — and that is in the aurelha —, and then introduce the ray above and press your hand on it to compress the liquid temporarily until the oil is expelled into the cavity of the auzenment and the patient feels the oil dripping.
E aquo que sia enfundut en la aurelha sia ja scalfat am foc un petit.	And that which is in the aurelha should already be heated by fire a little bit.
E guarda te que la causa la qual distillaras en l’aurelha no sia trop frega, quar las medicinas de aurelha no suffertan aquo.	And be careful that the cause which you will distill in the aurelha is not too cold, because the medicines of aurelha cannot bear it.
Capitol .vii.	Chapter VII.
De curacio de opilacio de aurelhas.	Of the cure of the opening of aurelhases.
Alcunas veguadas alcus enfantz yeysso dels ventres de lors mayres no-perforatz, e aquo ja accideys en alcus homes, opilacio en le meat de la aurelha per plagua o per carn nada en aquela; e aquesta opilacio alcunas veguadas es fayta en le preon del trau de la aurelha la qual no consiec le vezement, e alcunas veguadas es en las partidas defora.	Some women have been born without the belly buttons of their mothers, and this has also happened in some men, opening of the aurelhase through plague or for no reason at all; and this opening is sometimes made in the front of the aurelha which does not know the excrement, and sometimes in the parts in front.
E aquela que accideys en le preon de lu, la qual no comprehen le vezement, es en las majors disposicios de dificil sanacio.	And when an accident occurs at the front of the body, especially in the abdomen, it is often difficult to treat.
E en aquela en qual consegueys le vezement, cove que tu pauses la aurelha del malaute al solelh e reguarda en aquela.	And when the vomiting is successful, place the patient's head over the basin and observe that area.
E donc si vezes oppulacio apparent, obre aquela am espatum subtil del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if you see an obvious swelling, use this thin spatula-shaped tool to remove it.
Si’ la extremitat de lu en la qual sia petita la latitut, del qual la una partida sia aguda e l’autra no; e le spatum sia de dos latz leon per so que no fassa lizio al aurelha.	If the part of it that is small in size has an acute edge on one side and a flat edge on the other, and the spatula is two and a half centimeters long so as not to harm the head.
E donc si la opilacio es per carn nascuda en la aurelha o en le meat de lu, lahoras te aquela am oncis subtils e incidiys aquela vehement facilitat entro que sia ostada tota la carn.	And if the swelling is caused by flesh that has grown in the head or in the wound, then use this thin and sharp needle to cut it out before all the flesh has grown.
E si opilacio es en le preon de la aurelha, lahoras pren ray subtil leon e escalfa aquel am foc un pauc, e aprop met aquel en le meat de l’aurelha.	And if the swelling is in front of the head, then take a thin and sharp needle and heat it over a flame for a short time, and then place it in the wound of the head.
E donc si as scentit oppulacio am aquo que le malaute atroba am facilitat, per gravetat de ausir, esforsa la oppressio de lu am facilitat; e guarda te que no plagues les nervis del aurelha.	And if the patient has sensed that this position is causing them discomfort due to the heaviness of their body, then they try to relieve this pressure by moving; and be careful not to press the nerves of the ear.
E aprop pausa en l’aurelha drap de li segon la quantitat del ample del trauc lo qual tu as envolvutz en l’enguent egipciac; e fay aquo per alcus jorns entro que sias segur de la consolidacio de la plagua; o que prenguas qualgua e enfon aquela en ayguaros e pulveriza sobre lu segi trissat e usa de lu; e si vezes la aurelha ja esser apostemada, lahoras cove que tu estraguas la qualgua e permutes aquela am autra qualgua la qual tu envoloparas en cerot que sia fayt am oli rozat, entro que sia le apostema caut cedat; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then place a cloth of the second quantity, as wide as the opening of the ear canal, which you have wrapped around the elbow; and do this for several days until you are sure of the consolidation of the wound; or take any pus and insert it into a vessel, grind it with salt, and use it on the wound; and if you see that the ear is already infected, then remove the infection and replace it with another, which you have wrapped in a cerote that is made of oiled rag, until the infection has safely passed; and then cure it within a few days until it is healed.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras submergeys esponga o drap en aygua frega e pausa sobre la aurelha, e usa del autra curacio la qual restrengeys le flux del sanc, la qual es dita en le tractat de distillacio.	But if there is a sudden flow of pus, then submerge a cloth or cloth in wet water and place it over the ear, and use the other cure that restricts the flow of pus, which is mentioned in the treatise on distillation.
Capitol .viii.	Chapter VIII.
De cura de athezil le qual endeveno a las palpebras.	Of the treatment of atheroma, which occurs in the eyelids.
Athezil les quals endeveno a las paupebras dels huels alcuna veguada so humitz, alscunas veguadas son secs.	Atheroma, which sometimes occurs in the eyelids of the eyes, is sometimes dry.
Donc cove que tu tenguas aquels am tenhalhas o am onci, e inscindas aquels am espatum de las suas razitz, e aprop pausa sobre les locs segi trissat.	Therefore, you should hold these hot or cold compresses on their eyes, and then cut those spots from their eyelids, and place your hand over the areas as follows.
Mays si dolor am flux de sanc veno, lahoras tu cauteriza aquels am cauteri lanticular subtil.	If there is pain from blood flow, then you should use a pointed cautery to cauterize those spots under the eyelids.
E la milhor cauterizacio es aprop las inscizios e tropas veguadas retornam quan reman alcuna causa de sas razitz; e quan so cauterizadas am foc, aquelas razitz son comburidas e no retornan.	The best cauterization is to cut the spots and dry them when there is any cause of their eyelids; and when they are cauterized by fire, those eyelids are burned and do not return.
Capitol .ix.	Chapter IX.
Cura de grandeyssa que veno a las palpebras dels huels.	Of the treatment of granuloma, which occurs in the eyelids of the eyes.
Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alcuna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.	Some dry spots occur in the eyelids of the eyes, which is similar to granuloma in its strength and hardness, and because it grows, it is called a wart.
E es agreguacio de humiditat grossa en la palpebra dejos e desus.	And there is an accumulation of thick moisture under and above the eyelid.
Donc la opperacio en lor es que consideras lahoras si la grandissia es procedent en lu en aquo que apar de la palpebra e es mauguda a tota partida; e la causa de lu es leugiera.	Therefore, the operation in them is to consider whether the great swelling arises from that which appears on the eyelid and is contaminated throughout the entire part; and the cause of this is unknown.
Donc fen sobre aquela am fissura per la latitut, e aprop escorga aquela de tota partida am facilitat entro que evasesca, e aprop suspen aquela am onci e abscindeys aquela.	Therefore, make an incision over that part with the fissure through the width, and then scrape off that part of all the parts to facilitate its escape, and then suspend that part and abscise it.
Mays si a tu no es apparelhada la incizio de lu si no pus que penetras la palpebra am inscizio pauc a pauc, lahoras aquo no notz en deguna causa.	However, if you are not equipped with the incision of this part and do not push it so that it penetrates the eyelid little by little, then in any case, this is not known.
E si la figura es gran, lahoras tu l’ajusta am sutura; e cura aquela entro que sia sanada.	And if the figure is large, then you adjust it with sutures; and cure that part within which it is healed.
E si es pauca, a tu no sobrevindra mal per aquela quar l’anguent de lu restaura aquela e encarna.	And if it is small, then you will not be harmed by that which remains for this part of the ointment restores it and encases it.
E si la grandissia es declinant a las partidas dedintz de la palpebra deves la superficia dedintz, lahoras evesa la palpebra e suspen la grandissia am onci, otra que tu indigescas de incizio, e prem aquela de tota part, e si la palpebra per inscizio es alonguada, aquo no notz en deguna causa.	And if the swelling declines to the parts of the eyelid from the surface, then open the eyelid and suspend the swelling with an incision, another that you indicate of incision, and press that part of all, and if the eyelid by incision is elongated, then this is not known in any case.
E aprop la incizio, lava le huel am aygua salada; e cura le loc am aquo que encarna entro que sia sanat.	And then, approach the injury, wash it with salted water; and heal the area with that which is appropriate for it to be healed.
Capitol .x.	Chapter X.
De la cura axcirnah en la palpebra desus del huel.	Of the treatment of eyelids above the wound.
Axcirnath es grays le qual es engendrat en las tunicas de la palpebra desus, e majorment endeve als enfantz, agrava les huels de aquels et accideyso a lor catartz le mayti; e no podon reguardar la claror del solelh per aquo quar lagremas se coytan ad aquels.	Axcirnath is gray matter that arises from the tunics of the eyelid above, and especially in children, aggravates wounds to them and causes their catheters to fall out; and they cannot see the light of the sun because tears gather on those.
E per so tu vezes aquels jaser sobre les lors caras tot temps, e sobre les lors caras dormen; e so a las palpebras de lor dejos les sobrecils humidas, las quals ja ha cuberta imflacio, e iminencia de accernac apparent es en l’uelh; e que quant tu premes le loc am les tieus ditz, tu centes accernac entro aquels.	And so you see them always on their cheeks, both when they are awake and when they sleep; and their eyelids are humid, which have already been covered by inflammation, and the appearance of pus is in the wound; and when you press the area with your fingers, you push the pus into them.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	And sometimes the operation is performed when the patient lies on his back and places his head on your hand, and then place cloth under him and around him, and make a circle according to the amount that contains all parts of the body, and then place that above this and press all around the area to push pus into the middle of the circle, and then put in the middle of that humidity with sponge in the incision through its length, and the incision should not be larger than the incision made in fasciotomy.
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	May you cut the cord completely until you reach the arch, as in the most favorable positions, the arch is achieved through a slit following the form of white lead.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	Then extract those cloths that you have wrapped between the thighs, called parts of the foetus, and rotate them between your right and left hand until they are dispersed.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	And be careful not to adjust in the slit so that the space does not reach the bone and the other.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	May you adjust in the arch at the beginning of the slit, but if you do not appear in the arch, then adjust in the slit a small flat instrument until the process is complete; and then extract those that we have said; and then submerge cloths dipped in hot water and vinegar over them and place your hand on the area and stretch those flat instruments.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	And know that they are sprinkled with salt and placed in the cavity of the slit to prevent that which is left from that moisture.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then take care of that part until it is healed.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	However, if an abscess occurs in that location, then treat it with healing ointments until it is healed.
Capitol .xi.	Chapter XI.
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	About the methods of touching the wound.
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	When the lids of wounds are not adjusted by their natural hairs and their ancient ones, then those methods of maladies are used as if they were constant tears and softening of the eyelids and within that cause of destruction of the wound which is called tactinir of the wound, and it is cured in four ways: either by cauterization with fire; or by acute medicine according to what is said in the chapter on cauterization; or it is done by incision and suture; or by cannulas as I will say.
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	And therefore you should cover the head of the patient with your left hand; then convert the eyelid to your left hand, and if it converts, it is good; otherwise, insert a needle in the part that is farthest from the eyelid behind the eyelid, and make the needle penetrate through the part below, and that is — close to the margin of the eyelid where there are no hairs, and close to the hairs, and pull the thread above the eyelid, and convert it to the ray.
E aprop fen en la partida dedintz de la palpebra dejos les pels ajustatz am spatum inscidentz del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal mendre; e aprop extratz le fiel e pausa dejos la palpebra polvilhs petitz de coto o de drap, e aprop senha sobre la palpebra am tenta, e sia ayssi cum figura de fuelha de mirt.	And then insert a needle in the part of the eyelid just behind the eyelashes, into the lacrimal canal; and then remove the felt or cloth placed under the eyelid, and place your finger over the eyelid, and press gently, as if holding a reed.
Mays empero cove que sia la figura segon la quantitat de helevacio de la palpebra, quar aquo ja es diversificat en les homes, quar de aquels es le quals indigeys que sia inscidit de la palpebra gran quantitat segon la quantitat per la qual la palpebra es mollificada.	But it is important to note that the figure should be adjusted according to the amount of eyelid elevation, as this varies among men, and those who need a large incision in the eyelid should have it made according to the amount by which the eyelid is softened.
E aprop fen am le spatum sobre las doas linhas las quals has senhadas, e comensa del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal menor.	And then insert the needle over the two lines that you have sown, and begin from the lacrimal canal into the lacrimal duct.
E si’ la tua fissura prop dels pels naturals ayssi cum es la grossetut del rey.	And if your incision is close to the natural eyelashes, it should be as large as possible.
E aprop met le onci en un dels dos angles de la codena, e aprop excoria aquela tota, e aprop ajusta am la scitura las doas labias am gula o fiel de lana subtil, e abstergeys le sanc, e fay adherir aquo que superflueys dels fiels sobre dos sobrecils am alcunas causas enviscans, si voles far aquo, e sino, non cures.	And then place the onion in one of the two angles of the eyelid, and excoriate all of it, and adjust the stitch with two pieces of silk or wool thread, and remove any excess, and apply some causes enviscans, if you want to do so, and otherwise, don't worry.
E aprop leyssa la sutura dels fiels entro a tres dias o quatre, e aprop cura aquo.	And three or four days later, approach the stitches of the wounds and treat that.

E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	This is the shape of the forceps:

De reduccio de arizati al nas.	Of reducing a hernia to the nose.

Capitol .xxii.	Chapter 22.
