Therefore, when you want to do that, cut away three or four small sections of the epiglottis, between the circles, where the section should be flat, not in the cartilage, and this location is suitable for sectioning, which is private from flesh and the vessels of sinus from it are luhen.
E si le metge es pauruc, cove lahoras que extenda la codena del golayro am onci, e aprop fenda la codena entro que pervengua a la canal, mays evite les vaysels de sanc si vetz de aquelas alcuna causa.	And if the doctor is afraid, then extend the tube of the throat upwards, and then cut the tube until it reaches the canal, but avoid the sinus vessels if you see any cause from those.
E aprop inscida li ciplach segon que havem recomtat; e es significat sobre la seccio de la canal per le flacma le qual es de aquela eyssit am aquo que es de lu disromput e per la abscizio de la votz.	And then cut the trachea second, as we have recommended; and it means over the section of the canal by the flap that is from that and which is disrupted and for the opening of the throat.

Donc cum la hora es remauguda en la qual perforacio es temuda, agregua doas labias de la codena de la plagua, e cus aquela sola ses la cartillage.	So when the hour comes in which the perforation is feared, add two strips of the coda's tail to the plague, and place it alone on the cartilage.
E aprop administra medicinas que fan naysser la carn entro que sia sanat.	And then administer medicines that make the flesh not rot until it is healed.
E diyssec Albucasis que la summa del sermo le qual havem recomtat, exposicio no es sino que veias que alcus de aquetz apostemas ja han opilat lo guolayro del malaute, e le malaute es vengut entro a mort, e le ale de lu es entresecat, e alcus van a inscidir le epiglos per so que respire le malaute sobre le loc de la plagua per alcuna respiracio, e sia salvat de mort.	And as Albucasis says that the summary of the sermon which we have recommended is nothing but to see that some of those apostems have already filled the body of the patient, and the patient has come inside to die, and his head is bent over, and they have incised the epiglottis so that the patient can breathe over the location of the plague for some time, and he is saved from death.
E per aquo comandero layssar la plagua uberta entro que sia consumida la malicia de la malautia; e es la malicia de lu per tres dias; e donc lahoras comandero cosi la plagua, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	And for that commander, leave the plague open until the evil of the patient is consumed; and the evil of him for three days; and then the commander thus the plague, and cure it within which it is healed.
E aquo que yeu he vist per mi meteys, es que una sirventa pres un cotel e mesec le en le sieu golayro e inscidic am aquel una partida de la cana del pulmo, e yeu fu apelat a la curacio de lu, e atrobegui la mugen ayssi cum es mugit del moridos, e descubrigui la plagua e atrobegui le sanc le qual era yssit de la plagua petit.	And that which I have seen with my own eyes is that a servant places a spoon in the patient's mouth and inserts one part of the lung cane, and she was called to cure him, and she removed the phlegm as it is the moaning of the dead, and she removed the plague and removed the small sanc which was inside the plague.
Donc yeu fo confessat que aquela no havia inscidit vena ni guidegi, e le vent yssia de la plagua, e curegui aquela entro que foc sanada.	Therefore, you should confess that there was no incision of the vein or guided, and the wind was from the wound, and healed that within which fire.
E no accidic a la sirventa si no rauquiera en la votz, e aprop alcus dias retornec ad miloracio de las suas dispozicios.	And do not allow the servant to return to his better dispositions.
E ara dic yeu que en la seccio del epilhot no ha temor.	And now tell you that in the section of the epiploon there is no fear.
Capitol .xliv.	Chapter XLIV.
De seccio sobre apostema le qual accideys en le golayro defora, e es apelat hernia del golayro.	About the incision on the abscess that occurs in the groin, and is called hernia of the groin.
Aquest apostema nompnat hernia del golayro es apostema gran segon la color del cors, e es mot en las femnas.	This abscess called hernia of the groin is an abscess of the second color of the body, and is caused in the women.

Capitol .lii.	Chapter 52
De curacio de eminencia del umbilic.	Of the cure of hernia at the navel.
Eminencia del umbilic es fayta per motas causas; o per fissuras del ciphac le qual es sobre le ventre, e yeys de lu la tela o budel segon que endeve en las autras rupturas; o per sanc le qual flueys de vena o de arceria segon que es denant dit, o per ventositat coarctada en lu.	Hernia at the navel is caused by various causes; or by a fissure in the abdomen, which allows the intestine or hernia to come out as it does in other ruptures; or by weakness of the wall, which allows blood vessels or arteries to protrude as it is called; or by constriction of the abdomen.
Mays si es per fissura del ciphac e per yssiment de la tela, lahoras la color del apostema es semblant a la color del cors; e es leon ses dolor, e aprop appar de divers situament.	If it is by fissure of the abdomen and protrusion of the intestine, then the color of the abscess is similar to that of the body; and the pain is sharp, and appears in different positions.
E si es per egressio del budel, lahoras le situament de aquel am lu de aquo que havem recontat, de mays vehement diversitat, e cum tu premes aquel am les tieus ditz es occultat, e aprop retorna; e fort leu es am lu so, e es magnificat mot deves le introt de banh e vehement trebalh.	And if it is by protrusion of the intestine, then the position of that which we have mentioned is more violent and varied, and as you press on it with your fingers, it disappears and returns; and very often it is in the same place, and is a great sign of the need to introduce a catheter and violent effort.
Mays si per humiditat, lahoras es leon e no es occultat quan premes am la tua ma, ni es constrengut, ni es cregut.	If it is by moisture, then the pain is sharp and does not disappear when you press on it with your hand, nor is it constricted or contracted.

And the operation in it is considered whether the prominence of the navel is for lancing, or for a vein, or for suppuration; then it should be prohibited from the cure of it, because in that there is fear and fear as you have been taught in the chapter where he said about abscesses by lancing and by veins.

And if the prominence of the navel is for the intestine or for the hernia, then command the patient to hold their own arm, and be standing extended; and then apply a tent around the entire umbilicus, and command it to be facing between your hands on its own side, and then wrap the cord around the wide part of the umbilicus over the place you have well placed the tent; and then extend the base of the abscess to the parts above the ankle; and then apply a firm or loose bandage and the manner of tying the bandage.
E aprop huebre le mieg del apostema extendut sobre le liament e intromet le dit tieu en aquel indic e quereys le budel; e si tu l’as atrobat ni guardat per le liament, lahoras tu extratz alxorati e impelleys le budel a las partidas dedintz del ventre. E si has atrobada la tela, lahoras pren aquel am unci; e inscideys las superfluitatz de lu.	And if you have found the bandage, then take that needle and remove any excess of it.
Mays si es contraria a tu arceria o vena, lahoras circunda aquel mot, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio; e pren dos agulhas e met en aquelas dos fiels fortz e entromet dos agulhas en le circuit le qual has feyt entorn le apostema en manieyra de crotz, las quals fassas penetrar; e aprop strenh le apostema en quatre partidas sobre las agulhas. And at the upper part of it there is a ring, so that when the instrument reaches the water, then one should quickly place it over the instrument, and then evacuate the water in a moderate amount, because if you evacuate too much at once, it could cause great harm to the patient due to the resolution of their spirit animal, or an accident could occur to the five organs that are approaching death.

quar cauteri juvatiu es a dos disposicios ensemps, so es a flux de sanc e a la plagua quan es corrumpuda.	where the silver nitrate cautery is placed at two positions together, one for bleeding and the other for the wound when it becomes corrupted.

Capitol .lvii.	Chapter LVI.
De mundificacio dels enfants e de la curacio de aquo que accideys ad aquels de circumcisio.	About the cleaning of children and the treatment of that which happens to those who are circumcised.
Circumcisio no es solucio de continuitat ayssi cum las autras plaguas: mays empero cum sia de la nostra operacio e de nostra voluntat, e lus de aquela sia propriament en les enfants, es necessari que asignem en aquela milhor operacio e via pus leugiera perdusent a salut. But of the modification that is done with scissors and strips of cloth and a nail, the good one, I have experienced it myself, because the scissors are not proportional to the incision, for which reason the sharpness above is like the sharpness below; and therefore when you place your hand so that the two sharpnesses are proportioned, and the incisions are made at the same time; and it is done with compression of the nail in the shape containing the vein of the penis from all parts, and it does not make any error at all.

Capitol .lviii.	Chapter LVIII.
De curacio de urina retenguda en la vesiqua.	On the treatment of urine retained in the bladder.
Retencio de urina en la vesica es fayta per oppulacio fayta per peyra o per sanc congilat, o per poyre o per carnada, e semblantz ad aquels de aquo que havem dit de las manieyras de curacio en la divisio. And the method of collecting urine for that person is to take a thin piece of cloth or cotton and fold it into a small opening at the tip of the siringua; then insert the edges of the cloth into the part behind the siringua, and if there are any excess pieces of cloth, do not introduce them into the canula, but instead introduce the siringua with force into the border and the album of the wound.

And introduce the catheter to facilitate its passage until it reaches the tip of the lavender; and then bend the lavender upwards to the part of the abdomen; and then push the catheter through that; and then push it until it reaches the bladder, and if the cause of the patient's illness is not reached in this order, but is pushed into the wrong place, it will cause harm.
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	And then slowly extend the thread to the small wool, as the urine soaks the wool.

Capitol .lx.	Chapter 60.
De extraccio de peyra.	Of extracting stones.
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela. E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	The stone that forms in the bladder itself is the one that remains in the bladder.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	And you will notice that it is exposed and shortened.

E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And it is the cure for children of that age who have reached fourteen years; and it is difficult to cure in the elderly.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	In young people, it may be due to that which is between those.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And of that from which the stone is larger and the cure is more difficult; And if it is few, it is contrary to that.

And if you cannot touch the entire thing with your hand, then cover it with oil and place the tip of your left hand on the indicated part, if the patient is a child, or the tip of your right hand if they are an adult, and insert it into their anus.

E converteys aquela petit a petit entro al col de la vesica.	And slowly insert it into the neck of the bladder.

E comanda al ministra que prema la vesica am la sua ma; e comanda a un autra ministra que am la sua ma dextra extenda les genetius a las partidas desus, e am la sua autra ma remaugua la codena la qual es dejos les genetius, en partida del loc en le qual se fa la seccio.	And command the minister to press on the bladder with his hand; and command another minister that with his right hand extends the thighs above, and with his left hand remains holding the intestine which is behind the thighs, in part of the location where the section was made.
E aprop entromet espatum be inscident del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And then insert the pointed instrument that has this shape:
e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	And cut in that part between the buttocks and the genitals, not in the middle, towards the left side of the cushion; and the incision should be made over the stone and through the anus, and make a transverse section, so that the incision is wide and narrow according to the quantity that the stone is in that place, and not too much, because if it is too much the stone will be forced out of the incision, and its deficiencies will be exposed.
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	And know that there is a part of the stone that has sharp angles and edges, so that its removal is difficult for that reason.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And from that part it is like a lion's claw, round, and made of the same difficult material.
Donc si es aquela al qual so angles e marger, ajusta en la fissura.	Therefore, if it is to that part with sharp angles and edges, adjust it in the fissure.
E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat.	And if it is not too much exposed, then carefully cut that, or forcefully pull that with a decent gesture, the end of which should be like a razor that pulls on the stone, and does not slip from it; or insert it behind the subtle instrument with a curved end.
Mays si tu no podes sobre aquel, lahoras tu amplifica le trauc un petit, e si tu veus flux de sanc, abscindeys en strenh aquel am vitriol trissat.	If you cannot do that, then gradually widen the incision a little, and if you want to stop bleeding, apply strong pressure with that sharp glass tool.
Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	If the stone is larger than one, then at the beginning you push the tip of the instrument into the mouth of the bladder, and gradually incise over it; and then push a little more of that; and similarly do if there are more than two.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	And if the stone is very large, then it is often the case that you incise that with a large saw, which causes the patient one of two causes: either death or because of the continuous distillation of urine, for that reason the place is not completely solid.
Mays aministra expulcio de lu entro que sia fora-getada, o engenia en la fractura de lu am las forfexs entro que extragua aquela en pessas.	If you administer the extraction of it before it is forgotten, or if you use forceps in the fracture of it, enter them into the bladder and extract that in pieces.
Donc cum tu auras cumplit la tua opperacio, lahoras omple la plagua de enses de aloe e de sanc de drago, e strenh aquel.	Therefore, when you have completed your operation, then fill the wound with aloe and dragon's blood, and press that.
E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	And place a cloth soaked in oil or oiled and wet with water on it, so that the abscess does not open.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	And then lie the patient on their back, and do not remove the bandage until the third day.
E cum aquel auras desliat, embroca le loc am aygua e mot oli, e aprop cura aquel am enguent diafinicon e am enguent diabazilicon entro que sia sanat.	And when those wounds have been removed, rub the area with water and oil, and cure it with an ointment made from the plant called "diabazilla" until it is healed.
Mays si en la plagua accideys apostema caut, adhust e corrosiu, e de aquel semblantz ayssi cum si le sanc es en la vesica congelat, e per lu es la hurina prohibida (e aquo es conogut per la egressio del sanc am urina), a donc entromet lo tieu dit en la plagua e extratz aquel sanc, quar si roman provoca la vesica a corropcio de la vesica e de lu putrefaccio.	If an abscess that is causing pain and inflammation occurs in the same place, and if it is similar to the one that is frozen in the bladder, and if it is prohibited to drain it (and that is known as the exit of the pus through urine), then insert a needle into the abscess and extract that pus, because it can cause inflammation of the bladder and its putrefaction.
E aprop lava la plagua am vi agre, aygua e sal, e am opposicio a tota specia, am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then wash the area with warm water, soap, and salt, and apply an ointment that is suitable for that healing until it is healed.
E cove en las horas de tota la curacio que tu lies amdos las coyssas e ajustes las medicinas las quals so pausadas sobre le loc.	And cover all the hours of treatment that you have done on the patient and adjust the medications placed on the area.
E si la peyra es petita e es en le meat de la vergua, e es ficat en lu, e eyssement de urina es prohibit, lahoras cura aquel am aquo que yeu recomti denant que pervenguas a seccio, quar tropas veguadas per aquesta curacio yest acusat de seccio; e ja yeu e esproat aquo, e es que tu prenguas un perforador de ferr alfelut, del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if the stone is small and located in the middle of the bladder, and it is fixed there, and urination is prohibited, then use that which I recommended in order to reach the point where too many troops have been lost due to this treatment; and already I have extracted it, and you should take a needle made of iron with a sharp tip, of which this is its form:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	of triangular shape, sharp, fixed in a handle.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	And take a thin wire, and tie that bladder behind the stone so that it does not return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	And insert the iron into the bladder, piercing it until the needle reaches that stone.
E revolveys le perforador am la tua ma en aquela peyra petit a petit, e tu perforsa la perforacio de lu entro que fassas aquel del autra part penetrar; quar la urina tantost es absolta.	And rotate the needle in that stone little by little, and you will pierce the opening of it until you make the other part penetrate; for the urine is immediately released.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	And then place your hand on that which is located at the bottom of the stone in the part of the verge, which is called "trinca" and is urinated upon, and the patient is healed.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	However, if this cure cannot be applied for some reason that prevents it from being done, then place two people on either side of the stone.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	And then lie down on the stone in that verge between two ledges.
E aprop extratz aquela.	And then remove it.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	And then remove the bandage and apply the ointment to the wound, which is made on the spot.
E no es necessari liament de fiel dejos la peyra, sino per que no retorne a la vesica, e l’autre liament desus sino, quar quan es desliat le fiel aprop la egrecio de la peyra, la codena retorna a son loc e cobra la plagua.	It is not necessary to place a bandage on either side of the stone, but rather to prevent it from returning to the bladder, and the other bandage should be placed above, because when the true bandage is removed from the edge of the stone, the codena returns to its place and takes the wound.
E per aquo es a tu necessari quan lias le fiel desus, que tu eleves la codena a las partidas desus, o que retorne deves le tieu compliment, e cobra la plagua ayssi co havem dit.	And for that reason, when you have removed the true bandage, you must lift the codena to the parts above, or return it to its place and take the wound as we have said.
Capitol .lxi.	Chapter 61.
De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	Of extracting stones from women's kidneys.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Stones in women's kidneys are rarely formed.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	However, if one sees a stone in any of those, the cure is difficult, and it is forbidden by too many handsy people.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	One of them is that the woman is very weak and pregnant.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	And the second is that you do not find a woman who knows how to describe it to the surgeon when he is cast, or has had many husbands.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	The third is that you do not have a woman who knows this art, especially the operation of opening the abdomen.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	And the fourth is that the location of the incision over the stone in women's kidneys is longer than the location of the stone, so it is necessary to make an incision beforehand, and there is fear.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	However, if you are forced to do so, then you must get a very wise and rarely found woman.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	If you are not present with that person, then approach a woman sage and experienced in the art of women's matters, or a woman who has recently parted with her husband in this art.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	So bring that person and command her to do everything you order, from the examination of the stone until the beginning; this is because it is necessary to see if the woman is a virgin, then cover her and place your hand on her buttocks and feel for the stone.
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	Then, if you find that person, cover her with her own clothes, and then command her to lie down on the bed.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	But if she is not a virgin, then command the midwife to insert her hand into the cavity of the patient and examine for the stone, while placing her left hand on the bladder, and feel for the stone well.
Donc si atroba aquela, lahoras cove que gradantment maugua aquela de l’orrifici de la vesica a las partidas dejos am somman de la sua vertut entro que pervengua am aquel a la razit de la coyssa.	Then, if you find that person, gradually press her from the orifice of the bladder to the parts behind the pubic bone until she reaches the stone in the cavity.
E aprop inscida sobre aquela apposicio de la maytat del conh deves la razit de la coyssa de qualque part sia a lu parada e cent la peyra en aquela partida, e·l dit de lu no sia remaugut de la peyra coartan dejos lu.	And then approach the position of the patient's neck and place the edge of the cushion under their neck, centering the stone in that part, and the patient should not remain with the stone covered over them.
E la seccio sia pauca al comensament; e aprop entrometa lo ray sobre aquela seccio, e si sent la peyra, lahoras ajuste en seccio segon la quantitat la qual sap que la peyra sira getada de aquela.	And the section should be slightly smaller at the beginning; and then approach the ray over that section, and if you feel the stone, then adjust the section according to the quantity that you know the stone should be cut from there.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	And you should know that the types of stones are varied: some are small and large, sharp and rough, long and round, and have ramps.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	Therefore, you should know which type of stone is suitable for what you mean by that.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	And if you want to draw out pus, adjust the three-pronged needle in that location and place it there for an hour until the abscess is opened, and then return to your operation until the stone is removed.
E fay que prepares am tu dels instrumentz les quals e ditz en la extraccio de peyra en les homes, per so que sias ajudat per aquels en la tua operacio.	And make sure you prepare the instruments that are mentioned in the extraction of stones in men, so that you will be helped by those in your operation.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, e sabes que la expulcio del sanc es de la arceria que es insciza, lahoras tu pausa polvera sobre le loc e estrenh aquel am pulvils e strictura descent, e no iteras aquo; e layssa la peyra e no extraguas aquela, quar fort leu morira la malauta.	If you want to expel feces and know that the expulsion of feces is from the arc that is inserted, then place powder on the area and stretch that which is loosened and the structure descending, and do not repeat that; leave the stone and do not remove it, for the patient will surely die.
E aprop cura la plagua.	Then treat the wound.
Donc cum es cedada la acuitat del sanc aprop alcus jorns, e·l loc se poyreys, lahoras tu retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	Therefore, as the intensity of the feces decreases and the area improves, then return to your operation before the stone is forgotten.
Capitol lxii.	Chapter 62.
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	On incision for hernia.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	Hernia is not other than an accumulation of moisture in the white cord that contains the umbilical cord of the testicles and is called the cord.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	And some of them are in the proper panniculus that nature has prepared in the part of the umbilical cord before it becomes another umbilical cord; and this is the cord of the testicles between the white cord that we have said, and this is not other than a scar.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	When this hernia occurs, it is due to weakening of the muscles, which happens to some people, and sometimes it occurs due to a blow on the groin.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	This moisture has different colors, such as yellow, orange, red, brown, black, or white and watery, which is the most common.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	And the symptoms by which one recognizes this collection of water are: if it is in the white phlegm that we have called, then the abscess gradually changes into a long shape like a bird, and appears on the groin, because the moisture comes from all parts.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	And if the moisture is in the own panniculus, then the abscess gradually changes into a separate part of the bird, and it is estimated by some that it is another bird.
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	And if the moisture is between the creases of the groin and the white phlegm, then it is usually felt as pain.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	When you want to know the color of the humor in the abscess, first extract the color of the humor from the pus that is inside the abscess; and then judge what is inside the abscess according to that color.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	Then when you come to the treatment of the patient, first tell the patient to be phlebotomized if it is possible for them, and then examine their pulse.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	Then have the patient lie on their back with their buttocks raised for some reason, and place a cloth under them.
E aprop setz tu sobre la part sinistra de lu, e comanda al ministra que segua a la dextra de lu, le qual extenda la sua vergua a hun de dos latz a la codena dels genetius e a la partida del mirac del ventre.	Then place yourself on the left side of the patient, and command the assistant to follow on the right side of the patient, who extends their hand to one o'clock to the groin and the part of the belly.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	Then take a thin knife and cut the groin of the patient from the middle towards the pubic bone.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent.	Then make the incision straight and evenly distant from the line of the groin until it reaches the white circle that contains the pubic bone.
E excorja aquel, e observa, e guarda te per aysso que tu no inscidas aquel; e la tua excoriacio am la qual aquel excorjas per partida jassia que sia suspenduda am le huou mays e subtilment escruta am la excoriacio segon la quantitat a tu possibla.	Exorcise that person, observe and guard yourself so that you do not injure them; and your exorcism should be done gently and subtly according to the amount possible.
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	Then pierce the bottom of the jar with a wide hole and extract all the water.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	Then separate between two lips of the section with the incision, and extend the jar to the parts above; do not touch the cord that contains the genitals, and pierce the jar in that way that is possible for you.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	And pierce them on their totality or in the feet, and more greatly their side subtly, because if you do not subtly examine the incision of it, it is not certain that the water will not return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	If the cord processes from that deforation of their cord during your operation, then when you have completed the section of the jar, return to them and adjust the two lips of the cord of the genitals with a stitch, and care for that as with the other wounds until it is healed.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	And if the abdomen is corrupted by another illness, then carefully tie the veins that support it, remove the abdomen, and care for that which we have said about it.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay.	And if the water is added in two equal parts, then you will know that two are hernias; therefore, insert the part that you have made in the other equally; and if it is to your sight that it is an operation, then do it.
E aprop tu abstergiys le sanc, e entramet en las seccios lana submersa en oli o en oli rozat; e pausa deforo autra lana la qual tu as submersa en vi e oli, e expandeys aquela sobre dos genetius e·l mirac del ventre; e pausa desobre draps doblatz e pulvils, e lia aquels desobre am liament le qual es segon aquesta forma:	And then you will clean the wound, and insert it into the incisions with wool submerged in oil or roasted oil; and place another piece of wool that you have submerged in vinegar and oil over two genetius and the mirror of the belly; and place cloths and powders on top of them, and bind those with a bandage according to this form:
e aprop sian preses dos draps e sian humplitz de lana carmenada segon aquesta semblansa; e sian faytas las extremitatz am les quals es premut de coto o de lana humida, e sian agreguatz am strectura en le braguier de las braguas, e la una de las extremitatz prengua del cul entro al dos, e la segonda prengua a la partida del pantenilh, e dos extramitatz sobre dos coyssas dejos e dos extramitatz autras sobre dos angonars, e tota extrictura sia ajustada en le braguier de las braguas.	And then press two cloths and fold them according to this form; and make the edges of the ones that are pressed from cotton or wet wool, and attach them to the structure in the belt of the trousers, and one of the edges holds the buttocks inside the two, and the second holds the part of the underwear, and two edges on two cushions and two other edges on two elbows, and all the structure should be adjusted in the belt of the trousers.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:	And some vegetables are used to medicate this hernia artificially with a cautery instead of a section with iron; and you take a thin pointed cautery and insert it into the groove of the ginitius, and ignite it after we have recommended that it be revealed before the white cipher containing water, and then you take a cautery in this form:
e es asemblat a letra greca.	and it is shaped like the Greek letter.
E aprop perfora am aquel ciphac, e es ignit entro que tota la humiditat sia fora-gitada.	And then pierce that cipher, and ignite it inside so that all the moisture is expelled.
E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	And then extend the cipher with a hook, and scrape with a hook, and scrape with a thin pointed cautery ignited; and insert it as much as possible inside so that you eradicate all of it; and guard yourself from the heat that the fire does not touch.
E sapias que aquesta operacio es pus salva e pus longinqua de flux de sanc, e milhor que operacio am seccio.	And know that this operation is safer and longer than a section with less bleeding, and better than an operation with a cautery.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	But if you feel contradiction to the abscess at the time of section or at the time of cauterization, or bleeding, then cover that you cure what contradiction it causes for you with that cure, which is appropriate according to what is said.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	If the patient is weak and does not want the second operation due to its horror, then administer the second puncture as I recommended; and when you are sure that this hernia is dangerous.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	Then, make the patient lie on some raised bed, approach the abscess in the lowest part of their back, and pause the puncture according to its length.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	And make sure the opening is wide enough for all the water.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	Then place your hand over the area and hold it there, so that the water keeps flowing out.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	And then care for them until the wound is healed.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	But if there is resistance to the outflow of water at that time, then do not puncture it unless you put in the white cloth in the orifice of the wound which causes resistance and prevents the outflow of water, then you can insert a pen or instrument of the kind that extracts water from hydrips, the shape of which is preceded; or adjust a small pressure on the edge of the wound.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	When the water returns, and it is added back after several months or in the same environment; and as it is added back, then according to that manual method, the patient will pass their days.
Capitol .lxiii.	Chapter 63.
De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	About incision over a fleshy hernia and its treatment.
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	You should know that in the incision of this hernia, there is a risk of loss of major dispositions; therefore, I see the removal of it and being saved by that better method.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	And you should remember the operation in that one and the species of abscesses.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.	Therefore, say that abscesses do not form in the places where those gentlemen are composed and it is done for various reasons: either due to excessive acute aggravation, which is poured into them, or due to impact.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	And the color of the abscess is according to the color of the place, and it is not black in pain, and it is a heavy abscess.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	And if the abscess is greatly inflamed, its color is dark, and it does not give pain to touch.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	Some wounds are made by the breaking of the ribs, and by the inflammation of those that already exist, or by the inflammation of the veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	This is known as the rupture of ribs because the abscess breaks when it comes into contact with the thighs, and it does not matter if you touch it.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	This is not dispersed from the wound for any reason due to compression of the thighs.
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	And it is possible that on this special case and on the other flesh; you insert the suture of the genitalia, and then tie the vessels above, and remove that from the white cord, and remove the suspensory of the vessels, and ligate them, and insert the suspensory as you remove all of the parts of the vessel.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	Therefore, if the wound has already healed on those flesh, then you can remove it and suture it.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	If there is adhesion due to some cause of the bladder, or between those that are between the buttocks, then you should remove all of that adhesion and incise it from the beginning with a round knife.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	But if there is meat native to that location behind the adhesion, then you should incise all of that which is from it, and extract it as we have said.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, when your operation is completed, then fill the wound with a layer of wool soaked in rose oil and vinegar; and then care for it with the other treatment until it is healed.
Capitol .lxiv.	Chapter LXIV.
De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	Of the treatment of a hernia that is of the groin.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	The groin is an abscess wrapped in a sac similar to a bursa, and it causes difficult movement exercise and walking on the buttocks.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	And in the treatment of this disease, there is fear for that which precedes it.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, if they say operation in that second one that made the first ones.
E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.	And say that the patient should lie on a raised bed; and then hang the testicular suspensory apparatus to the parts behind; and then take the cord of the genitals and pull it towards the thighs, which are spread out wide; and have another minister hold those parts, and extend them strongly.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	And then insert the narrow, sharp instrument across the right of the veins where the veins are exposed.
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	And then remove all the parts that we have mentioned in the extraction of the eyeballs, which are in the sockets.
E aprop fica en aquelas un’agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.	And then insert a needle with a double point into those places, and the first one in the parts where we have happened to put it, and the other one at the end of them.
E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.	And then insert them in the middle part by a straight section according to the length of the body, and extract what has been added from the filthy and corrupt humors.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	And then care for the wound with the treatment of other wounds in which you want to generate health by causing the veins that do not cause damage to one or both testicles, because it is not bad for that.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	If all the veins are affected, it is possible that the testicles are extruded or that the testicles are compressed by the veins, so that they are deprived of all nutrition due to the beginning of the veins, and that they are swollen, or that they compress because they are not well attached to those.
Capitol .lxv.	Chapter 65.
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	About the treatment of intestinal hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The occurrence of this hernia is due to a section that extends over the abdomen from the side of the belly button, causing the intestines to protrude through the rupture of any of the intestines.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And this rupture is either from the abdomen or from an incision of it, and these two species occur for various causes: impact, sneeze, cough, or elevation of a heavy cause, or from similar things.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	And the reason for this is that when it occurs due to extension of the abdomen, it happens gradually over time and does not happen suddenly, and it is an abscess that enters the intestine because the abdomen compresses the intestine.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	When the patient's leg is affected by the section of the sciatic nerve, which causes severe pain suddenly at the beginning; and it appears to be an abscess different from the usual one, and that is due to the intestine, and the cause of this is the disintegration of the sciatic nerve.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	Sometimes, the intestine is pushed out by the abscess, and this is called an enterocele.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	Sometimes, the abscess is caused by feces, and sometimes it occurs in the intestine's wound, and it is held there, and that is a great danger for the patient, and sometimes it causes severe and more pain when pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the treatment of this disease, iron is used with caution, because it can cause harm to the patient's stomach.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	The method of the operation is that you command the patient to return the intestine to its cavity and place your hand over the area to prevent it from coming out again, and then lift their legs.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	Approach the cord that is attached to the testicles and separate it from the parts above, and insert the cord of the testicles completely through the long; and then place two fingers on the incision second when it is necessary to open the incision.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if the incision is of a quantity that is possible for you to have been opened from there.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then excise that tissue which is located below the cord of the testicles, until it is discovered white and hard from each part.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Then you enter the tip of your finger into that place where the testicle is located, in that place where white and hard tissue is found between the cord of the penis, which is located below the cord, and between the tissue, and remove that adherence that is in the part behind the penis.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And then press the cord of the testicles against the parts of the incision, and also extend the white tissue to the left side, and raise the penis with the white tissue to the part of the incision; and command the assistant to extend the penis and you dissolve that adherence which is behind the solution completed.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And surround the knees with a cloth that is not the cause of the intestine being wrapped in the white blanket.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	If you find any cause, then place it on the abdomen below.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then take a needle that is thick and made of iron, and insert it into the back of the white blanket, which is the seccion of the scrotum; and then incise the extremities that extend from four fingers, and place a cushion on them in the shape of a cross; and tie that needle to the white blanket which we have said is behind the scrotum and has a strong band of two parts.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then wrap the extremities of the fingers and tie them with a strong band that is not one of the veins that pierce those, because otherwise an abscess could occur.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And then place another band on the second line, about three fingers away from the first; and then leave these two bands below the white blanket which is behind the scrotum, the amount of the greatness of the said, and incise the entire remaining round, and remove it from there.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then insert your hand into the part behind the base of the testicles, section by section, as we have recommended in this matter, as we have said before.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And then administer wet wool, and place it on the wound; and apply the bandage that we have recommended (and some white linen is sometimes cauterized, which we have said to do at the beginning of the treatment, because some wounds bleed excessively, which happens).
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if the wound is delayed in healing, then apply warm water and place it over the wound as we have said before.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And then care for the wound with the other treatment of wounds until it is healed.

De hernia ventosa.	Of inflammatory hernia.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this hernia, no one has been seen to have been healed without iron.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the first said that it should be done as we have recommended in the hernia that is inflamed; the method is to tie the vessels above the section, with the help of the wound; and then dry it in the middle location around the pus, until the vessels fall.

Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter 67.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	About the dislocation that occurs in the elbows.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Sometimes there is a rupture in the elbows, as we have said, and examine the location.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And there is no known cause for hernias in the groin; and if there is, it is rare; and return to all hours.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if the time is prolonged, a fissure is made in the groin until the hernia is found in the groin; and this is done by the extension of the groin, which is in the elbows as we have said, which causes that the groin is stretched, and then it becomes soft and the location becomes an abscess and examines.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the treatment of it is with a pointed cautery as previously described.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And sometimes it is cured with iron in this way: and that the patient lies on their back between your hands, and then the location of the abscess is secured by incision according to the size of three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then strengthen the white cloth that is placed inside the mouth to be revealed.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And then take the rag and place it over the prominent part of the cloth, and press it against the abdomen.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then cover the two prominent parts on the end of the rag of the cloth, and adjust one of them with a stitch to the other.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And then remove the end of the rag, and do not insert the cloth into the abdomen at all, nor extend the bowel, nor any other cause that you know in the treatment of intestinal hernia.

And then cure that with the treatment of wounds, and as you insert the fields, clean it and restore the wound inside where it is consolidated; because the cloth contracts and is not adjusted to the prominence of rupture.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cauterization is better in this place, because it is more likely to be beneficial.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter 68.
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	Of the softening of the cord of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	When the cord of the testicles is softened in old men due to age, and the tissues that are between them become softened, and it is necessary to maintain their position.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	Therefore, it is necessary for the one who is appointed to care for the patient to place him in a position that allows him to lie on his side, and insert the entire cord over the natural cord; and then adjust two lips to the suture.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you want, cut off the excess of the softened cord at three or four places and make a firm suture.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	And then insert between the sutures; and care for the other wounds until they are healed and the wounds close.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter 69.
De castracio.	On Castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	You should know that castration in our law is excommunicated, but for certain reasons it is allowed to remember it in this book; and it is not necessary to remember it except for two reasons, one of which is that the doctor knows about it when he is asked about it, who can treat it; and the other reason is that we sometimes have the necessity of castration of other animals for our purposes, such as cows, pigs, and similar animals.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And so it is said that castration is performed in two ways: either by attrition or by incision through section.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	In the one that is done by attrition, the method of operation is to make a hole in the tail of the animal where the testicles are, while they are soft and hanging.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then take those out with your hand while they are resolved and do not appear from the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	In the one that is done by incision and section, hold the animal and take the cord of the testicles with your hand on the left side.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	And then lift the suspensory ligaments, and incise through one hole into each of the two testicles that proceed.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And then incise those that will be exposed after each excoriation.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	Do not leave any cause on those of the scrotum, but rather cover them with a thin one that is over the veins.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this method of castration is better than the one done by attrition, because attrition leaves no cause for the testicles so that the animal desires gout.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	And then care for the wound until it is healed.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter 70.
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	On the treatment of hernias.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hernias in men occur in two ways: one is when it appears where the space between the testicles is located, and another is between two testicles, where a part of the intestine is found.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And sometimes it contains urine, which is located in the space between the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	In women, it is a special case: and it is that the part of the intestine above the pubic bone is like two testicles of a man, a little below them and at the part of the vagina, where the perineum of a man and two testicles are.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	And the treatment is of three kinds: one from men and one from women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	And it is that you should insert those fleshy parts adjusted inside until it escapes the entrance of that one, and then treat them with the treatment of other wounds.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	And in the second special case of men where urine is excreted from the base of the testicles, there is no treatment or operation in it.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter 21.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	Of lentils and meat that are prominent due to causes of women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	Strong lentils are adjusted according to natural causes until it is stretched and made in the usual way; and some women are magnified in certain cases as long as it is spread there with men and during intercourse.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Then cover what you have excess of lentils with your hand or with an ointment and incise it.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And do not incise, especially at the opening of the urethra, so that it does not cause urine to flow out.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	Then cure that with the treatment of wounds until it is healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	Raw meat that is not cooked is meat that has been in the belly of the animal until it fills that, and strongly it is used for parts of the intestines (and by that first called "rotten" disease); therefore cover what you incise there as with lentils, and cure that until it is healed.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter 72.
De curacio de alratica.	Of the cure of arthritis.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Arthritis is when the joint of the woman is not perforated, or it is a small one.
E es o natural o accidental.	And it is natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	Accidental is caused by the previous illness, and that one is made from flesh not properly adjusted or from thin or thick skin.
