Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	Remember that which is formed in the womb from embryos and are aborted.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Some women are formed in the womb, one, and two, and three, and four, and five, and six, and seven, and more than ten, and it is already verified that one woman aborts not at all, and another forms all, which causes this to be made because of the glory of the holy saints.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And all such things should be in the knowledge of the midwife that it is very useful to that person similar to that, and therefore it is applied to that which is known.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter 76.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	About the extraction of the fetus when it dies.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you care for the dead fetus, use that which we have said in the division of medicine and it is not deformed and ready, and you should be able to use operation by hand, then consider whether the woman is of sound virtue and not of any of the accidents by which she is feared for perdition.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	When the woman is lying on her back with her head resting on a pillow, and her head inclined slightly and her limbs raised.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	And the assistant holds her arms at a distance or lays them on her chest to prevent the umbilical cord from extending during extraction of the child.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	Then you moisten the mother's mouth with oil and a mixture of mint, fennel, and sesame seeds.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	And then the midwife places her hand on those oils and mixtures, and then inserts her hand into the mother to facilitate delivery, and then covers the area where the umbilical cord is in the child.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	In such cases: Then you consider whether the child is prepared to cry over his own head, and then you look for the umbilical cord in the neck of the child, or on the collarbone, or in the mouth, or in the palate, or behind the beard, or on the breastbone, or in the locations appropriate for the back, or behind the hypochondriacs.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	If the condition is on his feet, then in the plantar region, or in the middle of the back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And hold the needle with his thumb on the straight part of the hand, and press the curve of it in that place which is between the fingers of the other hand, and insert the needle into any of those places which we have said, until you reach the cause of pain.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And then place and hold another needle in the same position, or a third one if necessary, so that it is attached equally, and not stretched more than straightly.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And it should be applied to all parts, so that the discharge of it is as it is done in teeth for its eradication.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And in that place where the extension is softened; and if any part of it is held, then hold that which is between those fingers wet with oil and insert those experiments and rotate those which are held.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore, if the part of the fetus is forgotten, then the toes are moved into the space that is most suitable; and make sure that the entire fetus is forgotten.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	If the hand is on the other side, and it is not possible to reduce it by its covering, then wrap a cloth around that; and remove it entirely, and insert it or in the joint of the hand or in the cavity.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And make sure to do the same in the other hand and both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	If the head of the fetus is large, or it is stuck in the covering in the essence, or it is in the cover of water that is not adjusted, then insert between the mentioned spines and cut the head and extract the water, or use an instrument called “alundat”, the form of which will come from the forms of the other instruments in the capital which is appropriate for this.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And similarly, do the same if the fetus is naturally large: and then insert that into the forceps, or take it with the instrument called “alundat” as we have said; and remove the bones with the forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is exposed and restrained by the furcula, then cut it open so that the moisture inside the chest can be drained.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	If it is not complicated and the head is not too fat, then you should insert it as soon as possible according to your own ability.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the left side of the abdomen is abscessed or in hydropic state, then pierce it so that the moisture inside can be drained.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	If the fetus is on its feet, then the direction of the uterus should be towards the mouth of the uterus.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	If the abdomen and chest are restrained, then remove the cloth that has been wrapped around your hand and pierce the abdomen and chest so that the moisture inside can be drained.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	If the other members are still intact and the head returns, then insert your right hand; but if the mouth of the uterus is open, then insert your hand into the vagina, surround the head, and pull that cord towards the mouth of the uterus, and then insert one or two fingers.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	If the mouth of the mother is closed by an abscess that has occurred to her, then do not force it open; before doing so, first administer an injection of thin, wet humors.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And apply ointments; and follow the patient with waters that soften and moisturize.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the wound is on their side, if possible, it should be pierced: and that which we have said in the living wound should be administered.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then it should be scraped off with a spoon, and extracted.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And do not leave any cause of death in the second stage.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And after you have completed all your work, then administer that which we have said about the cure of abscesses that have occurred to the mother.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if blood flow occurs from the wound, then first apply styptic waters and administer the other cure.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have seen a woman in the womb of whom was dead, and another fetus had been prematurely born, and another died.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	It happened to him that he had a long time ago an abscess in his abdomen; and when the fire was brought over, he began to tremble violently.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to care for him, and I treated him for a long time, but the wound did not heal.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I placed some strong-adhesive plaster on him for certain causes, and after several days, I removed one bone, and after a few more days, I removed another bone; and he was very surprised, as there were no bones in his abdomen.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought that they were bones of a dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	So I followed the wound, and removed some bones, which were existing in his abdomen in various dispositions, and had been there for a long time, causing him to have a slight fever.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I did not think it was strange, but rather that in this case there was knowledge and help for this that the skilled physician would administer for healing.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of instruments that are necessary to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	The form of a hook is used for this, which is inserted through the mother's womb:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a forceps in which the fetus is grasped, to which it is attached by two hooks on both ends of its handles:
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	However, this hook should be more slender than restrictive, and it should be made of iron or wood:
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And the width of each rod should be two fingers wide, and the margin of each end should be one finger wide, and the length of each should be a palm and more; and in the middle of the two rods there are two adjustments of that measuring rod which are already fixed, whose length is the greatest of a palm and a little more, and the width of each is two fingers, or a little more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two adjustments should be inserted into the mother's mouth so that they can be grasped when you turn the two described hooks:
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another similar form of that more subtle and less dangerous poison:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Should be made from a bamboo stick or second-hand iron, according to the similarity of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	But at the end of this tool, there should be two additions with handles, and the length of these additions is about one palm, and the width of each is about two digits.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open the larger one, first place your hand on the left side of the patient's feet, then insert that which is between his thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then raise your hand with the tool according to the amount you want to remove from the opening of the larger one, so that the midwife can do what you want.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of virtue which the ancients said:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Form of impelling, which is pushed into the fetus.
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Form of amidation, which is held in the large head.
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is similar to forceps at the end of which there are teeth, sometimes, and some forceps are made like this, sometimes, at the end of which there are teeth that are sharpened and held.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Form of administration for small amounts:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Form of one ounce having a spike:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	Form of one ounce having two spikes:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	Form of forceps with which the closing jaw has a point that the tip of the fetus can be contained:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Form of a spatula having two ends, and the tip is removed:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Form of two flat spatulas:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All these instruments are exercised, and when more they are multiplied in the species of that and prepared by the craftsmen, as it is more suitable to their operation and more convenient for the people by their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And do not work with those instruments whether it is from there or not, because the need for those is not excuseable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of extraction of the second tooth.
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the second tooth is held, then command the patient to hold their own tongue, and make that sternutation in condition, and place your hand on their mouth and on their nostrils, and if by chance it is deformed or dislocated, so be it.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, then take an egg and pierce it on the cover with a sharp object and place it in the herbs that are burning at the mouth of the mare, such as calamint, rough and rue, and camomile and scicados arabic and cassia lignea and sainturea.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All these herbs or some of them are submerged in water in the egg, and place that over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a siphon of cavernier in the mouth of the mare, and hold that inside until the vapor comes to the cavity of the mare.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then do that shaking as we have said, and the second time it is removed quickly.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	If this cure is not effective and does not work, then command the midwife to dip her left hand in olive oil or in a mixture of althea, and then insert that into the womb and massage it for the second time, and as soon as it finds it, then take it and extend it little by little if it is attached to the pregnant woman's belly, then insert her second hand as we have recommended, and when it finds the second time, extract it little by little correctly so that the pregnant woman does not catch the violent attraction.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Above the knees, which should be moved to the right and left for ease of access.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And then adjust it to the appropriate amount of attraction, so that it will obey and avoid adhesion.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mouth of the mother is covered, we have already recommended the cure for suffocation and the medication of the eye with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	And if all the causes that we have recommended are not forgotten, then guard yourself from performing it on that one in the iteration of abstraction, but rather cover what is necessary from the patient's mouth to the mother's mouth with a cloth, and then apply a poultice made of enguent and tetrafarmacon; for that will cause it to rot within a few days and dissolve and be forgotten.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	And when it rots, raise the patient's head and stomach, and that will help the patient; and then cover what is necessary with sub-fumigations and appropriate for that.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	May ancient authors also mentioned under-fumigation of nitrates and dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	The form of the instrument by which the woman is under-fumigated is for the retention of menstruation and the secondinea.
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It should be made of iron or copper.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And the thin end should be placed in the fire and the thick end over the fire, and the under-fumigation should be placed over the coals of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And hold that one until that under-fumigation is consumed and repeat another.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Of the healing of the child's unperforated anus.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	If newborn children and their anuses are not perforated, which have been thinly scraped and oiled.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then have the midwife perform that scraping; otherwise, scrape that space sharply, and make sure it does not touch the skin.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And place your hand over that moistened wool in vinegar and oil; and cure that area until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	If you fear that they may be asleep, then place a catheter in their bladder to urinate, and remove it when they want to defecate.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And if there has been an abscess in the anus for consolidation of the plague or abscess; then cover that consolidation to be incised, and then cure it with the same remedy as we have mentioned for the cure and the poultice.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	For the treatment of fistulas that occur afterward.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	The fistulas that occur in the lower part of the body, which are more numerous and which occur near the anus or in the space between the buttocks.
E es una fistula o motas.	And if it is a fistula or a wound.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And if that wound is ancient and comes from the moisture, a white or thin pus, and some of these fistulas penetrate.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those penetrating ones are recognized by the fact that they come out with urine and wind; and some of them use the patient's urine, and it is often found in these worms.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And some of these fistulas are sometimes woven in the space penetrating into the bladder, and into the meat of the penis; and some penetrate into the joint of the thigh and into the navel.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And in the case of a fistula that penetrates into the anus and does not penetrate, you insert your finger into the anus, and gently insert a thin needle or iron into the fistula when it is not turgidity.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is turgidity in that case, then gently insert the thin needle or iron into the fistula until you feel the needle or hair in your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not feel it at all or experience any cause of diarrhea, worms, or flatulence, as we have said, then know that it is not penetrating, and then proceed with the cure.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula penetrates into the bladder or into the meat of the penis, then the meaning of it is entirely of urine from that place and prohibition of it so that that place may be consolidated by medicine.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	If the infection penetrates into the joint or bone and causes pain in the limb, it is likely that the joint is infected if there is swelling around the bone and pain in the affected part; and that it may recur quickly; and that it is not suitable for that medication, nor is it consolidated with ointment.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	In all these fistulas, the cure is not complete, and the cure of those is difficult and depends on the skill of the surgeons over which it is stopped.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	If in that which is not penetrating and not ancient, the cure is expected to be successful according to what you have recommended and what has already been done.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And it is that the patient lies between your hands on his back, and raises the cushions of him into them, the cushions are inclined to the belly of him, and then insert the probe of plaster, or of earth if there is swelling in the fistula, until you know the location where the probe enters.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if you see that the patient is leaning towards the back, then insert your finger into the anus.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you feel the tip of your finger has already penetrated, or another thing that you feel between your finger and the patient's body, then you will certainly know that it is penetrating; and then do not treat in that place, as it is not a cure, as we have said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	However, some people say that this is a cure for certain diseases.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And for the treatment that is hoped to be effective in this, you should ignite a fine cauterizer according to the width of the fistula, as previously mentioned, and insert that ignited cautery into the fistula until it reaches around the anus; and then repeat this two or three times until you know that all the affected flesh has been burned away, resembling a quill of a porcupine.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then apply ointment to the affected area until all the burned flesh has healed, and then apply medicine to generate and consolidate the new flesh; if it is healed, then it is good; and if not, then it will not be healed at any time by another cure.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	If the probe enters and does not penetrate into the anus, which is in the buttocks, and between that and the probe there is a velamentous membrane of flesh or skin, and if the fistula is in that place on the surface of the skin, then dry the skin from the beginning of the fistula, and you will see if the probe dries inside the fistula, and if it reaches the location where the end of the probe is, and through the probe it is released and catheterized.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And then clean those fistulas that are assembled like a pen needle and have no cause of those.

But if blood flow occurs between you and your operation when those flesh is inserted, then milk that is and from the pus use a sharper instrument to cauterize with fire or with acute medicine, because the cauterizing iron with fire adjusts good doses: it adjusts those flesh adjusted, and abscess of the blood extraction of the humidity.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And then carefully remove the thick cloths or pads that have been placed inside or outside the wound, and then carefully remove the hard meat that has formed and solidified in the wound.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	These are medicines that have both astringency and dryness; when it is restored, it heals and there is no risk of recurrence.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	If the fistula has already reached the anus and extends to the surface of the rectum, then insert the finger into the anus and explore that area.
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And if the tent is centered and it enters between you and it is made of skin or meat, and is prepared for penetration, then it is not an operation in that way but a second way of trust and hope.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	This cause is to be administered in that way in three ways: either to cauterize that which we have said; or to dry up that which you can reach the cavity of it by which it is possible to enter and treat those things and the curative plan proposed; and not process any motive for sepsis so that you do not insert the contents of the bowel, and that an accident occurs on the patient's will and immediately from the information of the history; and then cure that which we have said is very strong and heals; or to lengthen that veil and cleanse that puddle which dries up that which is prepared for penetration into the rectum, as we have said, or with the tent or with another instrument of sharp extremity, and to remove those fistulated meats which are in the section inside where you can perform crustation; and then to exert yourself to restore the entire wound section, and if the opening does not consolidate, and the fistula remains open in the part of the rectum, and it is more dangerous for the patient.

e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	And insert the probe into that group of flesh or around those; and then insert the probe into the fistula until it reaches its cavity.

Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada. The shape of the spiral probe that is used to puncture the fistula: the curvature of which is sharp on one end and blunt on the other end, so as not to injure what is not necessary, sometimes.
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	Stitching of hernias where the intestine runs through the incision at the beginning of those.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Hernias occur in two ways, either between the thighs like a cyst, or they are like a lump of fat.

Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	But if the arms are not held with those because of their moisture and softness, then take those with dry cloth or cotton or woolen cloth, and remove those from them, and then insert those and powder some charcoal at the beginning, so that they will be in place as a cauterizer; or cauterize them according to what is written in the chapter on cauterization.
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And then cure those with the other cure until they are healed.
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	And if the belly does not open, then crush the patient with a crucifix in which there is a small bite, and wash them with that water which is in the belly and which opens the exit better when the patient exhales.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	If the swollen parts are deformed at the anus, the cause of this is often a worm, and you should remove them with your nail or a needle, scrape them out, and then care for them with the ointment we have mentioned before they are healed.
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha. E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	Do this for all of them, and leave one untouched, so that the excess blood from that one flows out.
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	And then place a cloth soaked in rose oil or wax on the anus; and place this on the abdomen and command the patient to lie down.
E aprop layssa aquela entro que caja; e quan es casuda, cura aquelas am enguentz o am autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then leave that one inside the box; and when it is healed, cure those wounds with ointment or other treatment until it is healed.
De curacio de fistulas.	Of the treatment of fistulas.
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Masses of vegetations that arise from excessive dryness or natural constriction.

De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	Of the treatment of almsamir, it is said.

E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you wish, cauterize the second one that precedes in its chapter.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	The molluscum is a small, raised, round wound on the surface of the body, and moths come out of its legs in children.

E ja so eradicadas enversas e no-enversas am le instrument le qual yeu diyre.	And already the inverses and non-inverses are removed with the instrument that he said.
Mays formica es eminencia petita feutrada o fistulada grossa sobre la superficia del cos anant mot en le preon, e quan le freg atroba aquela es centit en lu semblant de mordificacio de formigua, e es fayta entorn le cos. And the treatment is to take a sharp needle made of gold or iron, and it should be strong, and place it on the part where the worm is contained within the circle of the needle; then rotate your hand with the needle inside the circle where you have inserted that which is in the circuit of the worm, and place it on the flesh, and remove the worm from its nest.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you want to do this with a needle made of iron in this way:

De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	In the form of instruments that are administered to give anesthesia.

La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The large and small intestines:
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes. And the other end of the catheter, which is inserted into the anus, should be dull (not sharp) like a lion's tooth, thin; and on one side of it has two holes, and on the other side one hole, and the size of the holes should be according to the thickness of the rays and slightly larger.
E sia la borsa en la qual sian pausadas las medicinas de vesica de bestia o de pel de ovelha, e la razit de lu sia un palm.	And the bag in which the medicines of the bladder of an animal or sheep's wool are placed, and the reason for it is a palm.

E aprop entromet en aquels traucs fiel fort de fiel cru le qual sia de detz fiels, o enviro aquels; e ajusta am aquel la borsa; e quan es pausada en lu la borsa, sia streyt en le cap del cristeri entre dos distingentz am fort costriccio, e aprop cristeriza am aquel quascun trauc: Mays la qualitat de cristerizar am aquel es que tu omples la borsa de la medicina, que sia escalfada segon la quantitat de la tolleransa del malaute; e guarda te que no sia trop cauda ni trop freja.	And then insert the thin, sharp needles into those holes, or around them; and adjust the bag to it; and when the bag is placed in it, it should be straight between two distinguishing strong constraints, and then cauterize each hole: May the quality of cauterizing it is that you fill the bag with medicine, which should be scalded according to the tolerance of the patient; and remember that it should not be too hot or too cold.

And then the patient should be placed on their back, and their legs raised and supported by a pillow or a blanket; and then apply a warm ointment made of oil or albumen of egg or mucilage of fenugreek or similar substances to the anus to facilitate evacuation, and the nurse should hold the basin and express the contents until it is all evacuated from the intestine; and then remove the basin and the patient should lower their legs to the side.

De curacio de las plaguas.	Of the cure of plaques
Yeu ja e dit en la divisio de la curacio de las plaguas aquo que convenia al libre, e yeu dic assi la curacio de aquelas am ma e am medicinas segon le conpliment.	He has already said in the division of the cure of plaques that what was suitable for free men, and he says so thus the cure of those who are slaves and servants is according to the complement.
Donc dic que las plaguas son diversificadas segon aquo en que son faytas las plaguas e segon le loc sobre le qual cazo las plaquas.	Therefore it is said that plaques are diverse according to what is the nature of the plaques and according to the place where they are found.
E las causas per que motas vetz son faytas las plaguas so ayssi cum getament de peyra, o inscisio d’espaza o de cotel, o percussio am lansa, o am fustz, o am sageta, o semblantz ad aquels de motas causas.	And the causes for which plaques are formed are such as with a stone in the gallbladder, or an incision of a spike or of a knife, or by a blow from a lance, or a stick, or a sword, or similar to those of other causes.
Mays las plaguas que so en les locz del cos so ayssi cum plagua la qual catz sobre le cap, o·l col, o·l pietz, o·l ventre, o·l fitge, e semblantz ad aquels dels membres.	May the plaques that are in the places of the body be such as the plague that catches on the head, or neck, or chest, or abdomen, or wings, and similar to those of the members.
E yeu so recomtant la curacio de alcunas plaguas per que pauses aquela ratiocinacio e regla sobre las autras plaguas.	And he recommends the cure of some plaques because of that reasoning and rule over other plaques.
E yeu comensare de las plaguas del cap simplas, quar la rememoracio de las compostas vindra al comensament del tertz capitol.	And now I will begin to describe the simple wounds of the head, for the memory of the composed ones will come at the beginning of the third chapter.
Donc dic que quan accideys en le cap plagua simpla e no es fractura, lahoras considera: si es per getament de peyra o de semblant, e ja ha trinquada la codena tant solament e es gran plagla e temes sobre aquel malaute havinement de apostema caut, lahoras tu te coyta e fleubotoma la cephalica tantost, e no tardas aquo; e extrats ad aquel del sanc segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu si no mes alcuna causa prohibent de fleubotomia, majorment si·l sanc que es eyssit de la plagua es pauc.	So it is said that when a simple wound occurs on the head and is not a fracture, if it is caused by a stone or something similar, and has only been washed with water and is large and you fear that the patient might develop an abscess, then you should immediately perform a trepanation on the cephalic bone as soon as possible, and do not delay this; and extract the pus from it according to the amount of its power if no other cause prevents trepanation, especially if the pus that is in the wound is little.
E sia la flaubotomia del contrari de la partida plaguada; e guardase le malaute de replecio e de vi e de viandas grossas.	And if the trepanation is on the opposite side of the wounded part, then keep the patient away from heat and heavy foods.
Mays si de la minuicio prohibeys alcuna causa, lahoras sia aminorat de la vianda e no apropinque a carn ni a vi.	But if there is any cause that prevents the minimization of the food, then reduce it and do not approach meat or fish.
E pausa sobre la plagua, si a lu accideys apostema caut, coto enfus en oli rozat solet o en vi en le qual es stipticat.	And place your hand over the wound, if an abscess has formed there, and pour in warm oil or place something hot on it to stop the bleeding.
Mays si est segur de apostema caut, lahoras pausa sobre la plagua, si es recent am le sieu sanc e le ayre no ha mudat aquela la polvera la qual yeu recomtare aprop petit.	If you are sure of the abscess, pause over the wound, if it is recent, apply your own clean cloth and air has not changed to that place, then apply a small amount of powder that I will recommend to apply.
E si le ayre ja ha mudada aquela, lahoras pausa sobre alscus enguentz entro que sia sanada.	And if the air has already changed there, then pause over the wound with ointment until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua es gran o es per inscizio d’espaza e de semblantz, e no so ajustadas las labias de lu per puvils, lahoras ajusta aquelas am sutura segon que yeu recomtare de la sutura de lor.	If the wound is large or extends into spaces and is not adjusted by fingers, then adjust those with sutures according to what I will recommend for their sutures.
Mays si la plagua ja es discuberta del os e pen, e no es retencio de lu sino un petit suspensori, lahoras inscideys aquela e aprop cura la plagua am medicinas e restaura la carn aprop en loc de codena, e comanda al malaute que sia pescut de viandas en las quals es groceza: caps e formen coyt e semblantz a lor, entro que sia compost.	If the wound has already been discovered from bone and flesh, and is not retained but a small suspension, then insert that and apply medicines to the wound and restore the flesh in its place, and command the patient to eat foods in which there is grease: caps and form coytes and similar things until it is healed.
E si atrobas en la codena putrefaccio e no adhereys al os, lahoras tu inscideys tot aquo poyrit e geta aquo, e aprop cura aquo.	And if there is decay in the wound and does not adhere to the bone, then insert all that putridity and remove it, and apply medicines to it.
Mays si en aquestas plaguas es arteria o vena de la qual fluxs de sanc pot evenir, e no es abscindida per medicinas, lahoras tu inquier sobre la arteria, e si atrobas aquela no-inscidida, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am spatum, o lia aquela; e si necessitat te provoca que aquo que havem dit no comfereys, lahoras tu cauteriza entro que·l sanc sia abscidit.	If in these parts there is an artery or vein from which unhealthy blood can flow, and it is not cut by medical means, then you should look for the uncut part of the artery, and if you find it, then you should incise it with a needle or sew it; and if necessity requires that what we have said does not work, then you should cauterize where the unhealthy blood is cut.
E si aquestas plaguas son simplas e petitas, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiere; enayssi que tu polverizas sobre aquelas aquesta polvera, quar consolidada aquela denant que l’ayre mude aquelas.	And if these parts are simple and small, the cause of their being so is leuger; in any case, you should powder them with this powder, which when applied to them will consolidate them so that air does not move them.
E la manieyra de la polvera es aquesta: recipe oli de enses partida una, de sanc de drago partida doas, de caus no-extincta partidas tres; sia tot mot trissat e crivellat, e de lu sia la plagua omplida, e sia constrengida per bona constriccio entro que be sobre aquela aderesca, e sia coagulada am le sanc.	The method of the powder is as follows: take one part of broken olive oil, two parts of dragon's blood, and three parts of unextinguished; mix all of this together, and fill the wound, and strengthen it with a good compression inside and outside, and coagulate it with the blood.
E aprop strengeys aquela desus am pulvils e leyssa aquela, e no la deslias mentre esta ayssi que no es apostemada, quar no es eredicada de lu la medicina entro que sia sanada.	Then strengthen it above with the powder and leave it there, do not remove it until it is healed, because the medicine cannot be repeated if it is not healed.
E alcuna vetz fa aquo sola cautz, quan no es a tu en present enses e sanc de drago.	And some have done it alone with cauterization, when you are not present and cannot do it yourself.
E ja fa aquesta meteyssa operacio en las grans plaguas quan conveneys que sia pausada sobre aquelas e sian streytas, e so plaguas recentz am le lor sanc, las quals le ayre no ha alteradas.	And this medical operation is performed in the large intestines when it is necessary to stop them over those and straighten them, and their recent wounds are closed with their own skin, which has not been altered.
E si le ayre las ha alteradas, e majorment quan es en temps d’estiu, lahoras no es entencio a la posicio de aquesta polvera, mays adonc cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit, enayssi que tu pauses sobre aquelas alcus enguents degistius, o que pauses sobre aquelas pols de la farina del ordi am aygua e mel entro que getan poyredura; e aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And if the air has altered them, and especially when it is in the summer time, then do not apply this powder to that position, but first cure those with what we have said, whether you place it on those wounds with disgusting ointments, or on those wounds with flour of bread mixed with honey and water until they are healed; and then cure those with the other cure until they are healed.
Mays si accideys am la plagua fractura en os, e es petita, lahoras tu extratz aquo am gesti.	But if an accident happens to the broken bone in the bone, and it is small, then you extract that which was said.
E yeu diyre la cura de las fracturas del cap en aquo que es envenidor.	And I will tell you the cure for the broken bones of the head in that which is venomous.
De las plaguas del col.	Of the plaques of the neck
Mays si la plagua accideys en le col, lahoras no es en lu differencia en medicacio, e entre la plagua del cap quan es simpla.	But if the plague affects the neck, it is not different in medicine, and between the plague of the head when it is simple.
Mays si ja le nervi del col es inscis o arteria, lahoras si es nervi, no es en lu engen sino que sia evitada curacio de lu am aquo que fa vehement stipticitat, ayssi cum ziniar e zegi que es vetriol e semblantz a lor quar nozo als nervis e contrazo aquel.	But if the nerves of the neck are cut or the artery, then if it is nerves, not in the engine but rather avoiding treatment with that which causes great stopticism, as well as ziniar and zege that is vetriol and similar to their quarrels that do not damage the nerves and contrary to that.
E no pauses sobre la plagua alcuna causa de tot freja, quar la sustancia dels nervis es freja e la continuacio de lu es am le cervel, le qual es le pus aut de totz les membres.	And do not place anything over the plague of all causes of freedom, because the substance of the nerves is free and the continuation of it is to the brain, which is the most important of all the members.
E si’ aquo am que es curat de medicinas leugieras, ayssi cum es caus lavada am aygua dousa, alcuna veguada enfusa en oli rozat o no-rozat, e thucia quan es lavada am aygua dousa e las autras peyras minarantz segon aquesta manieyra, e enguentz humitz.	And if that which is cured of false medicines, as if it is caused by washed with hot water, some vaporized in olive oil or not-olive oil, and then when it is washed with hot water and the others pearls minimizing according to this manner, and find humor.
Mays si la plagua es gran, lahoras aministra sutura, o coarta las labias de lu, e aprop cura aquela am pulvils entro que sia sanada.	If the wound is large, then administer stitches or tie the lips of it, and then cure it with powders until it is healed.
Mays si a la plagua es profunditat o accideys en lu a la pus bassa partida poyredura, lahoras perfora aquela en le loc mays depremegut.	If the wound has depth or accidents in the lower most part, then pierce it in the deepest place.
Mays si en la plagua ja es inscisa arteria e es conseguit flux de sanc, lahoras separa o secca aquela, o lia aquela, o cauteriza aquela si necessitat te provoca ad aquo.	If the wound has an incised artery and bleeding occurs, then separate or dry it, tie it, or cauterize it if necessary to prevent that from happening.
Mays si ja ha insciditz les spondils del golayro o tot, e so salvadas las venas del col, lahoras tu ajusta las labias de la codena am sutura sobre la cana del golayro e no toques aquel; abantz egala aquel e reduzeys aquel sobre la sua figura natural, e aprop strenh aquel am strectura decent, e leyssa aquela per alcus jorns; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz en les quals es stipticitat e excitacio entro que sia sanat.	If the ribs of the chest or all have been incised, and the veins of the neck are saved, then adjust the lips of the wound with a stitch over the edge of the chest and do not touch that; equal it to that and reduce it to its natural figure, and apply strength to that with structures that are decent, and leave that for several days; and then cure it with ointments in which there is astringency and excitement until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua ja en le os a fayta enprecio, lahoras percuireys aquela, e lahoras si en lu ha fragmentz de hos, extratz totz aquels que podes de lor; e aquo que a tu no es apparelhat, leyssa aquo entro que la plagua se poyrisca, e sia separat e la egrecio de lu sia alleujada.	If the wound has pierced the bone, then perforate it, and if there are fragments of bone in it, extract all those that you can from them; and that which is not visible to you, leave it until the wound becomes festered, and then separate it and let the pus of it drain.
E si la plagua es recent lahoras polveriza sobre aquela polvera la qual t’e recomtada.	If the wound is recent, then powder it with the recommended powder.
Mays si en la plagua es fayta fistula, lahoras cura aquela am aquo del qual la rememoracio vindra aprop en le sieu capitol.	But if a fistula is made in the wound, then cure it with the same thing that will come to memory soon at its capital.
De las plaguas del col o de semblantz quan fayta entre las spallas e es fayta am spaza o am cotel o am lansa o am semblantz.	Of the wounds of the neck or similar ones that are made between the ribs and are made with a space or a knife or a lance or a similar thing.
Si es percussio de lansa o de cotel, e vezes de lu la profunditat, lahoras considera mays si de la plagua yeys ventositat quan le malaute elena; lahoras sapias que la plagua es mortal.	If it is a percussion of a lance or a knife, and sometimes you see the depth of it, then consider whether the wound is bleeding when the patient breathes; then you will know that the wound is mortal.
E si en lu no es profunditat e la plagua es recent am le sieu sanc, lahoras tu pauses en lu de la primieyra horo polvera, e no strenhas aquel per que no sia le sanc retengut en la profunditat de lu e que retorne al cor e que aucigua le malaute, mays pausa en lu enguent atractiu, e deslia aquela doas veguadas le dia.	And if there is no depth in the wound and it is recent to its own scab, then you place powder on it during the first hour, and do not strengthen that so that the scab does not stick to the depth of it and so that it returns to the heart and so that no one hurts the patient, but place a wet bandage on it.
E si l’enguent no es a tu present, lahoras tu pausa en le orrifici de la plagua coto viel per que sucque aquo que yeys de las humiditatz; e fay que le malaute dorma sobre la plagua per que corra aquo que es en lu ajustat.	And if the gout does not present itself to you, then place your hand on the opening of the wound near the old scar to let out that which comes from the humidity; and make the patient lie on the wound so that the liquid that is in it flows out.
Mays si ja de la plagua son passatz tres dias o mays e no accideys al malaute spasme ni tremor de cor mal ni strictura de ale, e vezes las autras dispozicios bonas de lu, lahoras sapias que plagua es salva; e adonc cura aquela am calguas e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanada.	If the wound has passed three days or more without causing spasm, tremor of heart, or stricture of the abdomen, and other signs are good, then know that the wound is healed; and then treat it with ointments and the other cures until it is completely healed.
Mays si la sanacio de lu es excusada, e ja tot temps es uberta, lahoras sapias que ja es fayta fistula; cura donc aquela per le sieu capitol.	If the healing of the wound is delayed and it has been opened for a long time, then know that a fistula has formed; therefore, treat it by its capital method.
E si la plagua es per inscisio de spaza o de cotel, e es simpla en la superficia del pietz o del dos, lahoras cura aquela am aquo que es precedit de sutura, si es gran, o am polvera, si es petita.	And if the wound is caused by a cut of a knife or a spear, and it is simple on the surface of the thigh or the back, then treat it with water that precedes stitching, if it is large, or with powder, if it is small.
Mays si ja ha fayta enprecio en le os, e so ja de lu inscizas pessas, lahoras tu torqua la plagua e coyta ad extrayre aquelas pessas, si so separadas.	If there has already been an incision in the bone, and it is already cut through, then you will twist the plate and cover it to extract those pieces, if they are separated.
Mays si no so separadas, lahoras leyssa las entro que se poyresca la plagua, que la extraccio de lor es alleujada.	If they are not separated, then insert the instruments that can reshape the plate, as its extraction is praised.
E de las autras plaguas accidentz en les autres membres le juvament en curacio es le juvament de aquo que havem dit.	And of the other plates in the other members, the treatment is as we have mentioned.
De las plaguas del ventre.	Of the plates of the belly.
L’indisposicio la qual accideys en le ventre es o gran, o pauc, o migiera.	The disposition that occurs in the belly is either large, or small, or mixed.
De la gran alcunas veguadas yeys le budel o nervi del budel, per que es fayta intromissio de lor e la sutura de lor esser pus vehement e pus subtil.	Some of the large ones are the intestines or nerves of the belly, so that an incision into them is made and a suture of them is done more forcefully and more subtly.
E disrupcio petita es fayta dificil per autra manieyra, e siec se que la reduccio de lor es pus dificil, si no te coytes de la intromissio de lor al sieu loc tantost, quar se ubre e es engrossat per que le intrament de lu es fayt difficil.	And a small disruption is difficult to make by another method, and it is known that the reduction of them is more difficult, so if you do not make an incision into their place immediately, because they open and are enlarged, making the instrument for them difficult.
E donc la milhor disrupcio es migiera, quar en aquela no es dificil la reduccio del budel, ayssi cum es dificil en las doas specias denant ditas.	And therefore the best treatment is to migrate, because in that case it is not difficult to reduce the hernia, as it is in the two special cases mentioned.
E sapias que sutura del ventre es segon quatre manieyras, mays doas suturas son comunas que conveneysso en suturas de las autras plaguas del cors.	You should know that there are four ways to suture the abdomen, but two common methods are usually used for suturing other parts of the body.
E duas autras suturas proprias comunican a las autras plaguas, mays empero so mays proprias en la sutura del ventre.	And two other proper sutures communicate with other parts of the body, but they are more proper for suturing the abdomen.
E yeu recomti a tu quascuna am exposicio e declaracio.	I recommend that you explain and declare each one to you.
Donc dic que quan la plagua es petita e es eyssit alcuna causa del budel per aquela, e es fayt dificil a reduzir aquel, lahoras aquo es en una de doas manieyras: o per parvitat de la disrupcio ayssi cum havem dit, o quan al budel es venguda inflacio per la frigiditat de l’ayre.	Therefore say that when the part is small and there is no cause of the hernia for that, and it is difficult to reduce it, then in one of the two methods: either by peritoneal irritation as we have said, or when inflammation comes to the hernia due to the cold of the air.
E donc quan aquo es ayssi, lahora cove que tu scalfes aquel enayssi que tu submerges una sponga ho drap humit en aygua tebeza sola, o que coguas en aygua squinant, e cyperum, e spic, e embroques am aquela le budel entro que la imflacio sia resolvuda.	And therefore when that is the case, you should cover that part with a cloth soaked in warm water alone, or with water and wine, and spices, and embrocates at that place where the inflammation is resolved.
E alcunas veguadas fa aquo vi en le qual ha stipticitat, e es milhor que la aygua sola en resolucio de la imflacio.	Some vinegars are used in which there is astringency, and it is better than water alone for the resolution of inflammation.
E donc cum tu vezes la imflacio esser resolvuda, lahoras tu humecta le budel am aygua en la qual es coyta altea e malvas, quar per aquo es alleujat le intrament de lu am pauca causa.	And when you see that the inflammation has been resolved, then you moisten the intestine with water in which althea and mallow are boiled, because for this purpose it is an effective remedy.
Mays si es escusat le intrament de lu aprop aquesta curacio, lahoras scindeys la disrupcio un petit am strument am le qual so inscididas emorroydas.	But if the remedy is not suitable for this cure, then divide the disruption with a small sharp instrument that is not blunted by rust.
E la curacio primieyra es milhor, quan es propriada que no es seccio, e no sia occupacio a seccar aprop necessitat e defaliment.	And the first cure is best when it is appropriate that it not be dry, and not occupied with the need to dry and fail.
Del instrument, sec se la forma de lu:	Of the instrument, its shape is as follows:
La una partida de lu torta aguda, e l’autra partida no-acuta, e la extremitat subtil, e no sia am la subtilitat de spatum, abantz sia obtusa un pauc.	One part of it is sharp and curved, and the other part is not sharp, and its tip is thin, and not as thin as a needle, but slightly blunted at the end.
E donc cum la plagua es amplificada e yeys fora le budel, lahoras cove que la sua reduccio sia segon la forma de lu natural, en le sieu loc propri, si es possible sobre aquo, quar milhor es.	And when the wound is amplified and the intestine comes out, then place it back in its original form, in its proper place, if possible over water, because that is better.
Mays quan la disrupcio es ampla, e es en la partida pu bassa del ventre, lahoras cove que tu fassas jazer le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa las suas cambas pus autas que·l sieu cap; e si es en la partida pus desus del ventre, lahoras tu pause le cap de lu e·l pietz pus autz que las partidas dejos.	When the disruption is widespread, and it is in the lower part of the abdomen, then let it lie on its back, and place its legs as high as possible above its head; and if it is in the higher part of the abdomen, then let it lie on its side, and place its head and chest as high as possible.
E semblantment si la disrupcio es en una de las doas partz del ventre, lahoras pausa la tua entencio e la tua consideracio tostemps en aysso per que la partida en la qual es la plagua sia pus auta que l’autra.	Similarly, if the disruption is in one of the two sides of the abdomen, then place your hand and consideration quickly on the side where the pain is higher than the other.
E ayssi cove que tu aministres aquo en las plaguas grans e en las plaguas migieras.	And so that you administer it in the major and minor pains.
E en las plaguas petitas, pausa aquo que es a tu preparat, e aprop fay que·l ministre sia entre las tuas mas pyatados, le qual tengua la disrupcio tota am la sua ma e ajusta las labias de lu, e aprop descuebre de aquela ad aquel que siec la sutura alcuna causa aprop autra.	And in the minor pains, place the remedy that you have prepared between your fingers, and let the administrator hold the disruption entirely with his hand, and adjust its lips, and remove from one to another if there is any cause of a suture.
E aquesta es la manieyra de sutura comuna: una que prenguas la agula, o comte de agula segon la cantitat de la amplitut de la plagua; e aprop layssa de la extremitat de la disrupcio del dit anular, e strenh la agula una, otre que tu no metas fiel en las doas extremitatz de la codena, am doas extremitatz del ciphac que es dejos la codena de las partidas dedintz, entro que fassas aquela penetrar de aquela partida; e tu ja has agreguadas doas extremitatz de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, e so faytas quatre ordes.	And this is the common method of suturing: you take a needle, or count the second needle according to the width of the pain; and from the end of the disruption of the said ring, you strengthen the needle once, or do not put it in both ends of the cord, but in both ends of the thread that is behind the two parts of the wound, before you make that penetrate into that part; and you have added both ends of the cord and both ends of the thread, and it has been made four times.
E aprop strenh am fiel doble en le circuit de la agula, e alcunas veguadas de doas partz ensemps, e aprop agregua las doas labias e la plagua per agreguacio decent; e aprop layssa la grossitut del dit e fiqua una autra agulha en aquela, e aprop lia aquela am fiel ayssi cum fiest am la primieyra agulha; e no cesses far aquo si es necessitat am las agulhas entro que ajas complida tota la contriccio de la plagua.	And strengthen the double thread in the circle of the needle, and some sutures of two parts together, and then add the two lips and the wound by addition of decency; and then leave the large one and put another needle in that, and then tie it as you did with the first needle; and do not stop doing this until the wound is completely closed.
E sian las agulhas migieras entre groceza e subtilitat, quar las agulhas subtils mot leugierament insciden la carn; e las grossas so de dificil intrament en la codena, e donc per aquo cove que sian migieras en subtilitat e grosseza.	And the needles should be of medium size between coarseness and fineness, because fine needles more easily penetrate the flesh; and large ones are difficult to pass through the needle, therefore it is recommended that they be of medium size in terms of fineness and coarseness.
E no cove que la agulha sia ficada en doas extremitatz de la codena propdana mot, per so que la carn no sia inscidida leugierament e que la plagua se huebra devant la sua consolidacio.	And do not let the needle be stuck at two ends of the wound intended, because the flesh should not be penetrated too easily and so that the wound can heal before its consolidation.
E no sian prolonguadas de sutura per que la plagua no sia prohibida de consolidacio.	And do not prolong the sutures so that the wound is not prevented from consolidating.
E aprop inscideys las extremitatz de las agulhas per so que no ledescan le malaute deves le sieu dormier; e pausaras sobre la sutura pulvils expanduts de tota partida, les quals tenguan las extremitatz de las agulhas; e layssa aquelas entro que sapias que la plagua ja es consolidada.	And then carefully insert the tips of the needles so that they do not pierce the patient's skin; and place pulverized cotton on the suture, which holds the tips of the needles; and leave them in place until you know that the wound has consolidated.
E aquestas specias de sutura am agulhas en cal manieyra es pus convenient en las plaguas petitas, quar habasta en la sutura de lor una agulha o doas o entorn aquelas.	And these types of sutures with needles should be used carefully in small wounds, as the suture contains one or two or several needles.
Mays la segonda sutura es cominal: e es que tu aministres am sutura las quatre extremitatz, de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, en una veguada, am agulha en la qual sia fiel envolopat engual en subtilitat e grosseza.	The second suture is similar: and it is that you administer the suture to the four extremities, of the chain and two extremities of the cylinder, in a line, with a needle that is thinly and evenly wrapped.
E aprop quan am la agulha auras penetrat aquestas quatre extremitatz, reduzeys la agulha de aquela meteyssa partida de la qual comensest, per so que le fiel retrayt caja de la pus subirana partida a la plagua, per so que la sutura sia segon sutura de drap am la qual les draps so strengutz.	And then when the needle has penetrated these four extremities, reduce the needle from that same part of the wound, so that the first layer of the cloth does not rise above the wound, so that the suture is the second layer of cloth.
E pausa entre quascuna sutura la quantitat del gros del dit mendre.	And pause between each stitch the amount of thick of that torn part.
E aquesta sutura sabo les homes.	And this stitch should be done by women.
E am tal sutura yeu cozegui la plagua la qual era accidida a un home en le sieu ventre le qual era stat plaguat am un cotel, e era la disrrumpcio de la plagua major de un palm, e era eyssit dels budels entorn dos palms del budel del mieg loc e era la disrupcio en le mieg del membre; e adonc yeu reduzegui aquel depus que le budel havia stat foro la plagua per xxiiii horas.	And this stitch was used to repair a wound in a man's belly that had been cut with a knife, which was the rupture of the abdominal wall major of a palm, and was located around two palms from the intestine at the lower part and was the rupture in the lower part of the member; and then she reduced it so that the intestine had been through the wound for twenty-four hours.
E la plagua fo consolidada en le spazi de xv dias o entorn, e curegui aquel e es sanat; e aprop aquo visquec per motz ans, e es conversat en las suas disposicios.	And the wound was consolidated in the space of fifteen days or so, and that was healed and cured; and then she used this ointment for months, and she continued with her treatments.
E les autres metges havian jutgat que no fora sanat; e per miracle foc, quar yeu no curegui aquel am enguent, quar era en loc en le qual enguent no era atrobat ni deguna medicina, mays pausegui sobre la plagua coto viel dos veguadas lo dia e ablucio assiduo am aygua de mel entro que foc sanat. Mays yeu diyre dos specias de sutura proprias segon narracio de Paraula.	May you direct two special types of suture according to the narrative of Paracelsus.
E es que tu comenses am sutura de la codena, e entrometas agulha de la partida deforo a la partida dedintz.	And if you begin with the suture of the neck, insert the needle from the side of the skin to the side of the flesh.

Mays le juguament de medicacio de plagua es jutgament de las autras plaguas.	The judgment of plague medicine is the judgment of other plagues.

De curacio de zuchem e fistula.	Of the treatment of fistulas and abscesses.
Sapias que tota plagua e apostema quan se envilheseys e se Antiqua, e es fayt ulcus, e no es consolidat e geta braç tot temps e no es abscindit, lahoras, en qualque membre sia, universalment es nompnada fistula e nos la apelam aquela azukem.	You should know that any wound and abscess that becomes indurated and ancient, and is left to form an ulcer, which does not consolidate and constantly drains pus, in any member, universally is called a fistula, and we call it a sinus.
E fistula segon veritat es nodacio feutrada, dura, blanqua am la qual no es dolor e a la qual es conquavitat ayssi cum es conquavitat de pena de ausel; e per aysso nompnat aquela alcus rizatz, id est pena.	And secondly, a true fistula is a hard, white, painless lesion that is located in the same way as a painless ulcer; and to avoid confusion with that, it is called a rice-like lesion, that is, an ulcer.
E es en alcus homes humida, la qual geta brac; e fort leu la humiditat es abscidida en alcunas horas.	And in moist ulcers, which ooze pus, the wetness is usually drained off within a few hours.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta humiditat es mota, e es pauca, e es grossa, e es subtil.	And sometimes this wetness is moved, and it is thin, thick, and granular.

And I have already mentioned this in the division, as I said about the plaques, that every ulcer that is not healed or not in the raw flesh is not so but for one of these causes: among which one is from pus in the wound; or malice of the ulcer; or because between the ulcer and the lips there is hard flesh that prevents the growth of new flesh; or because it is caused by moisture; or because that ulcer itself becomes putrid and the matter that is in it is of bad quality; or because the medicine is unsuitable for its cure; or when corruption catches in the region, and it is pestilence; or because of the nature of the region, as in the case of Saragossa, where digestion of evils is difficult, and healing of the abscess by nature is slow.
Ja e mostrat totas aquelas causas, e·ls senhals de aquelas e la curacio de lor am medicinas en la divisio.	Here are all those causes, their symptoms, and the treatment with various medicines in this division.
E cove assi que yeu fassa a tu saber la curacio de fistula la qual es fayta per via de operacio am ma.	And now I will tell you how to treat fistula, which is caused by surgery.
E sapias que fistula accideys en totz les membres del cos; quar de aquelas son fistulas que perveno a las venas grantz e arterias, o als nervis, o al ciphac, o al budel, o a la vesica, o ad alcuna de las costas, o ad alcu dels spondils del dos, o ad alcuna de las juncturas compostas per composicio ayssi quo de la ma e del pe; e de aquelas so que dan a lu propinquitat del membre principal e de semblantz.	And you should know that fistulas can occur in all parts of the body; among these are those that reach the great veins, arteries, nerves, spleen, intestine, bladder, or some of the ribs, or some of the vertebrae of the back, or some of the joints composed as mentioned above.
E donc aquela de aquestas fistulas que es segon aquesta manieyra es de las malautias de dificil sanacio, e no recep curacio, e occupacio am aquela es trebalh e ignorancia.	And among these, the one that follows this method is of difficult healing, does not receive treatment, and occupation is often due to hard work and ignorance.

And if any of these fistulas has a depth that does not reach the mentioned locations, and you expect and trust in its treatment, and want to reach knowledge of it, then take an iron or steel probe, and if the fistula goes straight, and you can reach it with it.

E si no es sana e gieta brac ayssi cum fazia, lahoras sapias que tu no est pervengut a la eradicacio tota de la corrupcio; e adonc tu descuebre sobre lu segondanament e exquisitament fay la razio de lu e la mundificacio de lu am la deriera fortalasa tieua, e aprop restaura aquel.	And if it does not heal and the bone is not as it was, then know that you have not reached the complete eradication of the corruption; and therefore you expose again and carefully perform the reason of it and the purification of it with the strongest fortified tie, and then restore that.
E donc si es sanat, bo es; e sino, lahoras sapias que aquela corrupcio es en la profunditat longinqua del cors, la qual no ha conseguida, e adonc a tu en aquel no es engen sino laysar aquela. E si le os corromput es petit, o es a tu possible atirar aquel, lahora tu le atira am forceps subtils las quals conveno ad aquo.	And if the broken bone is small, or it is possible to pull it back, then use delicate forceps that are suitable for this.
E si so motz osses, lahoras exquisitament fay la extraccio de totz aquels, e de aquels no laysses denguna causa am la tua fortaleza.	And if you cannot move the broken bones, carefully perform the extraction of all those that are not affected by any cause.

Mays si a tu no es preparacio de ostar les osses de la tua hora, lahoras pausa sobre la plagua aquo que poyresca la plagua aquela, e layssa aquela entro que aquo es al enviro de aquels osses de carns e de liamentz, e guarda la plagua que no sia consolidada, e sia constrengida la seccio la qual tu has inscidida en la tua operacio.
